attributes.title: Purchase Your 13 x 13
attributes.description: Time to branch out.
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is another level higher after while making some delicious Cheddar Cheese! Come and join in on the action.

attributes.text: Save and use __total Coins to buy the expansion
Produce __total Cheddar Cheese to buy expansion

attributes.title: Purchase Your 14 x 14 Expansion
attributes.description: Time to branch out!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has just levelled up by producing Apple Jam! You can catch up and make jam of your own now!

attributes.text: Save and use __total Coins to buy the expansion
Produce 6 jars of Apple Jam to buy expansion

attributes.title: Purchase Your 15 x 15 Expansion
attributes.description: Time to branch out!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is now another level higher and is expanding the farm quickly! Join now to get a farm of your own!

attributes.text: Save and use __total Coins to buy the expansion
Produce 30 glasses of Grape Juice buy expansion

attributes.title: Purchase Your 16 x 16 Expansion
attributes.description: Time to branch out!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has just jumped another level! Join Family Farm Seaside and level up together!

attributes.text: Save and use __total Coins to buy the expansion
Produce 40 bottles of White Wine for expansion

attributes.title: Purchase Your 17 x 17 Expansion
attributes.description: Time to branch out!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has just hit a new level. Can you level up faster? Join Family Farm Seaside and see who is the true farmer!

attributes.text: Save and use __total Coins to buy the expansion
Produce 50 bundles of wool to buy expansion

attributes.title: Purchase Your 18 x 18 Expansion
attributes.description: Time to branch out!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has made cakes to pay for the new ranch expansion and reached a new level! Play now to expand your ranches together!

attributes.text: Save and use __total Coins to buy the expansion
Produce __total Love Cakes to buy expansion

attributes.title: Purchase Your 19 x 19 Expansion
attributes.description: Time to branch out!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is now a level higher and has completed the Warehouse which can now store decorations, animals and machines! Play now to have your own Warehouse!

attributes.text: Save and use __total Coins to buy the expansion
Have a complete Warehouse on your ranch

attributes.title: Purchase Your 20 x 20 Expansion
attributes.description: Time to branch out!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has produced Angora Hair to expand their farm and is now a level higher! Find out how to produce Angora Hair now in Family Farm Seaside!

attributes.text: Save and use 300,000 Coins to buy the expansion
Produce 100 packs of Angora Hair to buy expansion

attributes.title: Purchase Your 21 x 21 Expansion
attributes.description: Time to branch out!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has made some seriously yummy Almond Cakes and can now afford new expansions! Join in the fun now!

attributes.text: Save and use 420,000 Coins to buy the expansion
Produce 45 Almond Cakes to buy expansion

attributes.title: Purchase Your 22 x 22 Expansion
attributes.description: Time to branch out!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just levelled up by making some Fresh Corn Bread and it smells wonderful. Come play and bake your own bread now!

attributes.text: Save and use 550,000 Coins to buy the expansion
Produce 80 loaves of Corn Bread to buy expansion

attributes.title: Purchase Your 23 x 23 Expansion
attributes.description: Time to branch out!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just reached a new level by completing their Water Well! Have you got one on your farm? Play Family Farm Seaside now!

attributes.text: Save and use 700,000 Coins to buy the expansion
Have a complete Water Well on your ranch

attributes.title: Purchase Your 24 x 24 Expansion
attributes.description: Time to branch out!
attributes.opengraph_des: Level 38 for %s! What a wonderful smell! %s has just produced some tasty Turkey Sausages, and you can do it too by joining Family Farm Seaside now!

attributes.text: Save and use 900,000 Coins to buy the expansion
Produce 180 Turkey Sausages to buy expansion

attributes.title: Purchase Your 25 x 25 Expansion
attributes.description: Time to branch out!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has levelled up again and is now level 41 by producing valuable Sugar! Come get a sugar high and play Family Farm Seaside now!

attributes.text: Save and use 1,100,000 Coins to buy the expansion

attributes.title: Purchase Your 26 x 26 Expansion
attributes.description: Time to branch out!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is now level 44 and has a Tree Greenhouse to grow Trees faster! Get your own Tree Greenhouse in Family Farm Seaside now!

attributes.text: Save and use 1,350,000 Coins to buy the expansion
Purchase a Tree Greenhouse in your farm

attributes.title: Purchase Your 27 x 27 Expansion
attributes.description: Time to branch out!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has just levelled up and is enjoying farm-made Watermelon Jam! You can produce some too, play Family Farm Seaside now!

attributes.text: Save and use 1,600,000 Coins to buy the expansion
Produce 220 jars of Watermelon Jam for expansion

attributes.title: Purchase Your 28 x 28 Expansion
attributes.description: Time to branch out!
attributes.opengraph_des: Fantastic, %s reached a higher level by making Strawberry Candies! Join Family Farm Seaside now and you can do it too!

attributes.text: Save and use 1,900,000 Coins to buy the expansion

attributes.title: Purchase Your 29 x 29 Expansion
attributes.description: Time to branch out!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has reached a higher level and is enjoying his home-made White Mocha! Join in the fun, play now!

attributes.text: Save and use 2,200,000 Coins to buy the expansion
Produce 80 cups of White Mocha to buy expansion

attributes.title: Purchase Your 30 x 30 Expansion
attributes.description: Time to branch out!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has levelled up by producing some Red Rose Perfume! Come and play, and make your own perfume!

attributes.text: Save and use 2,550,000 Coins to buy the expansion
Produce 300 Red Rose Perfume to buy expansion

attributes.title: Purchase Your 23 x 23 Expansion
attributes.description: Time to branch out!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just reached a new level by completing their Water Well! Have you got one on your farm? Play Family Farm Seaside now!

attributes.text: Save and use 700,000 Coins to buy the expansion
Have a complete Water Well on your ranch

attributes.title: Purchase Your 31 x 31 Expansion
attributes.description: Time to branch out!
attributes.opengraph_des: Something something something

attributes.text: Save and use __total Coins to buy the expansion
Produce __total Red Eggs to buy expansion

attributes.title: 32 x 32 Expansion
attributes.description: Time to branch out!
attributes.opengraph_des: Something something something

attributes.text: Have __total House Points in Darryl's House
Save and use __total Coins to buy expansion
Produce __total bundles of Angora Velvet to buy the expansion

attributes.title: PRODUCING FLOUR II
attributes.description: Now let's sell the Wheat Flour to earn some coins.
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is richer after they sold their Wheat Flour! Come and play to become rich too in Family Farm Seaside!
attributes.hint: Go to barn, find the Wheat Flour, and tap the Sell Button.

attributes.text: Sell 1 Wheat Flour from the barn

attributes.title: PRODUCING FLOUR II
attributes.description: Awesome job! Now you're ready for your golden future, and build the farm of your dreams!

attributes.title: PRODUCING FLOUR I
attributes.description: Producing flour is elementary for every farmer. You can use flour to make many farm products, so let's produce some.
attributes.opengraph_des: Awesome! %s has made some Flour in the Dutch Mill. You can do it too, join Family Farm Seaside now!
attributes.hint: The Dutch Mill turns Wheat into Flour. That's the mill on your farm!

attributes.text: Add 1 Wheat to the Dutch Mill
Produce and collect 1 sack of Flour
attributes.tip: Put Wheat at the door of the Dutch Mill!

attributes.title: PRODUCING FLOUR I
attributes.description: Well done! The basics are covered: you can make flour!

attributes.title: YOUR FIRST CHEESE MASTER
attributes.description: I found Grandma Blair's old Cheese Master. She would like you to have it as a welcome gift! It is in your Gift Box!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just got a Cheese Master for free in Family Farm Seaside! Join now and make cheese of your own!
attributes.hint: The gift box is in the lower right corner.

attributes.text: Get the Cheese Master from the gift box
attributes.tip: Your Gift Box is in the lower right corner!

attributes.title: YOUR FIRST CHEESE MASTER
attributes.description: Super! You have got a Cheese Master! Don't you just love it??

attributes.title: FRESH MILK
attributes.description: Come on! Making milk is not hard, and it's fun to do!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has got some fresh milk on the farm! Play Family Farm Seaside and help make some more!
attributes.hint: Find a ripe crop and tap it to harvest. The crop will show up in your barn.

attributes.text: Feed the Clover to the Cow
Produce and collect 1 bottle of Milk

attributes.title: FRESH MILK
attributes.description: Wow, this milk tastes great! I'm no longer thirsty! You really are cut out for farming!

attributes.title: Welcome to Seaside I
attributes.description: Puh, not very difficult! I bet daddy would be proud of us! But just to be sure, do you think we can practice one more time? Plant the clover, fertilize and harvest it!

attributes.title: Welcome to Seaside I
attributes.description: Super! Now you know you got the hang of it!

attributes.title: Welcome to Seaside II
attributes.description: It's getting cramped here... Let's plow some extra plots, so we can plant tasty grapes on it!

attributes.title: Welcome to Seaside II
attributes.description: Make sure to have plenty of plots! More plots, more products, more rewards!

attributes.title: Welcome to Seaside III
attributes.description: Look at the cow! She enjoyed the clover and gave fresh milk. Collect it and use it to make cheese. You know how, right?

attributes.text: Produce and collect 1 bottles of Milk
Add 1 bottles of Milk to Cheese Master

attributes.title: Welcome to Seaside III
attributes.description: Perfect! Feels like you can do anything!

attributes.title: Welcome to Seaside IV
attributes.description: Let's get back to work. Grandma told me we need more cheese, so time to speed up the growing time with some fertilizers!

attributes.title: Welcome to Seaside V
attributes.description: Wow you are working as fast as a lighting. The farm will get back to glory in no time!

attributes.title: Learn to Harvest
attributes.description: Let's start easy. Just tap on the ripe clover to harvest it!

attributes.title: Learn to Harvest
attributes.description: That wasn't too hard, right? You think you can handle the rest of the basics?

attributes.title: FRESH MILK
attributes.description: Feed the clover to the cow to get milk! I will tell you later what you can do with it.

attributes.title: FRESH MILK
attributes.description: Mhh, yummy! Fresh milk is tasty, but wait. You'll need the milk for the cheese master!

attributes.title: YOUR FIRST CHEESE MASTER
attributes.description: Machines are used to make better products. Put milk in the cheese master to get cheese. It's worth more coins!

attributes.title: YOUR FIRST CHEESE MASTER
attributes.description: Use machines to refine your products and earn more coins!

attributes.title: Name your Farm!
attributes.description: Our cow is called Mary, but what is our Farm called? Let's think of a name, otherwise our neighbors won't be able to find us!

attributes.title: Name your Farm!
attributes.description: What a wonderful Farm Name! To change it, go to your Avatar Panel by tapping on your Avatar in the top left corner of your screen.

attributes.title: Farming is Magic I
attributes.description: Let me show you a magic trick. Are you ready? First I need some crops.
attributes.opengraph_des: Lil Darryl is teaching %s the ropes of farming. Play Family Farm Seaside and learn to farm together!
attributes.hint: Use the plow tool. Tap to place new plots wherever there is room on your farm.

attributes.title: Farming is Magic I
attributes.description: Good job! Ready for Lil' Darryl's magic?

attributes.title: Farming is Magic II
attributes.description: Here it goes: I know a way to make your crops ripe in no-time! Watch and be amazed!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s's is showing off a green thumb by using the Fertilizers! Join Family Farm Seaside to become an expert farmer too!
attributes.hint: To fertilize an unripe crop, tap on it and choose the fertilizer you want to use.

attributes.text: Get the Fertilizer from your Gift Box

attributes.title: Farming is Magic II
attributes.description: Way to grow, farmer! These fertilizers sure are handy, aren't they? Fertilizers will help you to quickly finish farm work!

attributes.title: Cheese Please I
attributes.description: Grandma Blair asked me to make fresh Cheddar Cheese. I think it's for one of her Tea & Cheese parties. Let's start with making Milk.
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is getting ready to make Cheese on the farm! Don't be the only person without your own cheese, play Family Farm Seaside and make some of your own!
attributes.hint: Feed Clover to the Cow,and collect Milk in time.

attributes.text: Produce and collect 3 bottles of Milk

attributes.title: Cheese Please I
attributes.description: Good job! Are you ready to make fresh Cheddar Cheese?

attributes.title: Daily Bread I
attributes.description: For Frank's Family Diner in the village, we need to bake bread. Home style, straight from the farm! Here we go!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is preparing for Frank's Family Diner. Don't miss the festivities, play Family Farm Seaside now!
attributes.hint: Add Wheat to the Dutch Mill to make Wheat Flour.

attributes.text: Add 3 sacks of Wheat to Dutch Mill

attributes.title: Daily Bread I
attributes.description: Good work! You now know how to use the Mill to make Wheat Flour! Spread the news to all farmers!

attributes.title: Daily Bread II
attributes.description: One of the ingredients for our bread is Eggs. You know what animal can provide that, right? That's right: Chickens!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has got a new friend on the farm! Come check it out in Family Farm Seaside!
attributes.hint: Buy Chicken Coop and extra Chickens in the Store, in the Animals tab.

attributes.title: Daily Bread II
attributes.description: Congratulations! You have a new animal on your farm! Share this with your friends!

attributes.title: Daily Bread III
attributes.description: We need Eggs to make Bread. Do you know which animals can provide eggs? That's right: Chickens! First, plant some corn to feed them.
attributes.opengraph_des: Making feed for your animals can be a lot of work. Come help %s out in Family Farm Seaside!
attributes.hint: Use the plow tool. Tap to place new plots wherever there is room on your farm.

attributes.title: Daily Bread III
attributes.description: Well done! Let's see what happens when you feed your Corn to the Chickens!

attributes.title: Daily Bread IV
attributes.description: The farm is where you learn the most. Some of the kids in school don't know that chickens eat corn. Can you believe that?
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just fed the Chickens and collected Eggs, farm-tastic! Join in the fun now!
attributes.hint: Chickens eat Corn,and produce Eggs.

attributes.text: Use fast production to produce a Egg

attributes.title: Daily Bread IV
attributes.description: Good work! You're on a roll! Find out what happens next!

attributes.title: Daily Bread V
attributes.description: You can produce many kinds of bread. One of kind is made with Oat Flour. Put your Mill to work!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s now can even produce Oat Flour in the Dutch Mill! You can do it too, play Family Farm Seaside now!
attributes.hint: Flip the switch on the Dutch Mill to produce Oat Flour.

attributes.title: Daily Bread V
attributes.description: Well done, farmer! Now you know how to use the Mill to make Oat Flour! Tell all your friend about this!

attributes.title: Daily Bread VI
attributes.description: I only get 10 coins per week pocket money. How is your account growing? Can you afford a Baker?
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is going to make it big with some bakery favorites from the farm. Join Family Farm Seaside and make a name for yourself, and make some tasty treats!
attributes.hint: Increase your profit margin by processing your crops into products.

attributes.title: Daily Bread VI
attributes.description: Well done! The Baker is a very profitable machine! This may very well be your first step towards riches and fame!

attributes.title: Daily Bread VI
attributes.description: You need a Baker. This morning I heard that the shop in town is offering a great new model!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is trying to get a machine to bake bread on the farm. Join Family Farm Seaside and lend a helping hand!
attributes.hint: Add Eggs,Milk and Wheat Flour in the Baker to produce Wheat Bread.

attributes.text: Sell 3 loaves of Wheat Bread from the Barn

attributes.title: Daily Bread VI
attributes.description: Good work, farmer! Can you see how Wheat Bread is more profitable than just Wheat?

attributes.title: More Eggs Please
attributes.description: Let's collect some extra Eggs. After all, bread without eggs is like a Facebook page with no profile picture!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s fed Chickens and Cow to produce a tasty Cheddar Cheese! Doesn't it smell great? You can make it too, come to play Family Farm Seaside!
attributes.hint: Feed Corn to the Chickens to produce Eggs. Feed Clover to the Cow to produce milk.

attributes.title: More Cheese Please
attributes.description: Good job! Eggs now fill your Barn. Find out what happens next on the farm!

attributes.title: Daily Bread IX
attributes.description: And now, for the Oat Bread. The family diner will be so grateful, not to mention its customers!
attributes.opengraph_des: See what %s is cooking up for the family dinner. Join Family Farm Seaside now!
attributes.hint: Put Oat Flour,Eggs and Milk in the Baker to produce Oat Bread.

attributes.text: Sell 3 loaves of Oat Bread from the Barn

attributes.title: Daily Bread VII
attributes.description: Awesome work, farmer! You've become a true bread master! Celebrate this with your friends!

attributes.title: Cherry-licious I
attributes.description: Has my sister Felicia shown you the Watering Cans yet? They're great!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s harvested in no time yummy red Cherries thanks to the help of Watering Cans! Come and check it out!
attributes.hint: Tap a Watering Can on your farm, then tap the base of the tree.

attributes.title: Cherry-licious I
attributes.description: You are so great! Did you see how fast that Cherry was ready for harvest? Remember this whenever you're in a hurry!

attributes.title: Cherry-licious II
attributes.description: Felicia talked about you at dinner last night. She said you're very good at making jam!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s's home-made Cherry Jam makes other neighbors hungry! You can produce tasty Jam too, join Family Farm Seaside!
attributes.hint: Flip the switch of the Jam Machine to produce Cherry Jam. Don't forget to add honey in the Machine.

attributes.text: Sell 1 jar of Cherry Jam from the Barn

attributes.title: Cherry-licious II
attributes.description: Good work! Did you notice how Jam gives more profit than just a Cherry?

attributes.title: Daily Bread VII
attributes.description: Great, you made it! Let me show you how to make Wheat Bread now.
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is gathering the necessary ingredients to bake some delicious Wheat Bread! Join in the fun and bake your own bread too!
attributes.hint: Add Eggs,Milk and Wheat Flour in the Baker, and delicious loaves will come out in seconds!

attributes.text: Add 3 bottles of Milk to Baker

attributes.title: Daily Bread VII
attributes.description: Good work! You're on a roll! I already smell the flavor of Wheat Bread!

attributes.title: Daily Bread VIII
attributes.description: Yummy! It's worth the extra effort to produce more wholesome Wheat Bread for the whole family!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s's Wheat Bread smells so good, even the animals want to eat it! Come and play Family Farm Seaside and get your own animals!

attributes.text: Sell __total loaves of Wheat Bread from the Barn

attributes.title: Daily Bread VIII
attributes.description: Good work, farmer! Can you see how Wheat Bread is more profitable than just Wheat?

attributes.title: Think Big I
attributes.description: Your farm is coming along nicely, but you'll need more room to grow soon. Time to branch out!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s sold home-made products to make a profit and invest it in a bigger farm! Come and play Family Farm Seaside to become a successful farmer yourself!
attributes.hint: Sell valuable products such as bread from your Barn to earn money.

attributes.title: Think Big I
attributes.description: Well done! Now are you ready to put your new plots to good use?

attributes.title: Think Big II
attributes.description: More crops means more business. With some farm-aids, your crops are ready for harvest real quick!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is enjoying his cherries and corn, come to play Family Farm Seaside for a healthy lifestyle!
attributes.hint: Cherry Trees are slow-growing. Plant more trees to get more fruits at a time!

attributes.title: Think Big II
attributes.description: Well done! You are master of your crops! Share some of your newfound power!

attributes.title: Grab a Bite
attributes.description: Oh... after all this crop growing, the chickens are starting to get hungry. Actually, I'm famished myself!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has made Eggs and Cherry Jam here in Family Farm Seaside. Sounds like a delicious breakfast, join in the fun and make one too now!
attributes.hint: Don't forget to flip the switch of the Jam Machine to the Cherry Jam position.

attributes.title: Grab a Bite
attributes.description: Good job! There now is enough to eat for everyone! Let's share this and see what happens next.

attributes.title: A Cry for Rye I
attributes.description: We have an order for Black Bread! Baker Ben seems to believe Black Bread will be the fad of tomorrow. Well, if he says so!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s made Rye Flour to produce Black Bread! You can do it too and bake together some mouthwatering Bread here in Family Farm Seaside!
attributes.hint: As the name implies, Black Bread starts with Rye. Put some Rye in the Dutch Mill to produce Rye Flour!

attributes.text: Add 3 Rye to the Dutch Mill

attributes.title: A Cry for Rye I
attributes.description: Well done! You're halfway to making Black Bread. Tell your friends, maybe they'll come to help!

attributes.title: A Cry for Rye II
attributes.description: Looks like Baker Ben was right! He wants to order more Black Bread, but we can only produce 12. Better plant more Rye next time!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s's home-made Black Bread is too good to be true! Come and find out how he made such delicacy here at Family Farm Seaside!
attributes.hint: Put Rye Flour, Eggs and Milk in the Baker to produce Black Bread.

attributes.text: Sell 12 loaves of Black Bread from the Barn

attributes.title: A Cry for Rye II
attributes.description: Good job! Plant more Rye to make Black Bread, who knows when the next big order will come!

attributes.title: Get Juicy I
attributes.description: Farming can make you thirsty! How about a glass of fresh fruit juice to quench your thirst?
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has now a Juice Machine, no farmer suffer from thirst here at Family Farm Seaside! Come and check it out now!
attributes.hint: Get the necessary materials from your neighbors, or simply buy them.

attributes.title: Get Juicy I
attributes.description: Great job, farmer! Let's see what this Juice Machine can do!

attributes.title: Get Juicy II
attributes.description: Apple Juice has always been my favorite. Grandma always squeezed apples for me by hand. But we have the machine now!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is making juice for everybody in Family Farm Seaside! Come to make some fresh juice now!
attributes.hint: We'll not just be making Apple juice soon! We can juice almost anything under the sun!

attributes.text: Add 3 Apples to the Juice Machine
Sell 5 glasses of Apple Juice from the Barn

attributes.title: Get Juicy II
attributes.description: Aaahhhh! This Apple Juice tastes great! Are you down for making Orange Juice too?

attributes.title: Get Juicy III
attributes.description: I want to use the machine to make another kind of juice for Grandma. What shall we make, maybe Orange Juice? Any ideas?
attributes.opengraph_des: %s planted an Orange Tree and is about to make Orange Juice! Help out, join Family Farm Seaside now!
attributes.hint: Find Orange Trees in the Store!

attributes.text: Buy a Ladder from the Store

attributes.title: Get Juicy III
attributes.description: Good work! You have Oranges now. Are you ready to make juice out of them?

attributes.title: Get Juicy IV
attributes.description: Hey, tell you what. If Grandma likes your Orange Juice, maybe she will see a good business in this product!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s's Orange Juice is tasty and sells at a high price! Gain some profits too, join Family Farm Seaside!
attributes.hint: See how Orange Juice sells for more coins than just Oranges!

attributes.text: Add 3 Oranges to the Juice Machine
Sell 3 glasses of Orange Juice from the Barn

attributes.title: Get Juicy IV
attributes.description: Well done! Grandma liked the Orange Juice - and the profit that it gave you! Share this and see what happens next.

attributes.title: Ready for a Rabbit I
attributes.description: It's Ol'MacDonald's birthday soon. No idea how old he turns, but I was thinking to give him a Rabbit.
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just got a present for Ol'MacDonald. Join Family Farm Seaside, and you can recieve gifts too!!!
attributes.hint: Rabbits eat Carrots and produce Angora Hair.

attributes.text: Buy a Rabbit from the Store

attributes.title: Ready for a Rabbit I
attributes.description: Good work! Ol'MacDonald will love this cutie! Spread the news to your friends!

attributes.title: Ready for a Rabbit II
attributes.description: If you want to see the rabbit in action, feed it some Carrots. The Rabbit's Angora Hair will earn more coins than carrots.
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has a cute new animal on the farm. Play Family Farm Seaside now to come check it out!

attributes.text: Feed Carrots to the Rabbit 3 times
Sell 12 bundles of Angora Hair from the Barn

attributes.title: Ready for a Rabbit II
attributes.description: Aaahhhh! Now you know everything there is about raising Rabbits! Tell your friends this great news!

attributes.title: Frank's Order I
attributes.description: Oh, by the way, there is a new order from Frank's Family Diner! He's short on tomatoes!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has begun making an order of farm products from Frank's Family Diner. Join Family Farm Seaside, and help fill the order together!
attributes.hint: Let's make sure Frank gets enough tomatoes for his diner!

attributes.title: Frank's Order I
attributes.description: Well done, farmer! Now Frank's Family Diner has more tomatoes than they know what to do with! :-)

attributes.title: Wine & Dine I
attributes.description: Grandma Blair is going into wine the business! She asked me to help set things up. Wow, this is going to be a great business!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s bought a Wine Maker, but it's not fun to enjoy a glass of wine alone! Join Family Farm Seaside now to make your own wine and enjoy it with your neighbors!
attributes.hint: Use the Ask button to collect wine glasses from neighbors. Don't trade them until you have 5.

attributes.text: Get a Wine Maker from the Store
Buy a Wooden Barrel from Store
Collect 5 Wine Glasses from your neighbors

attributes.title: Wine & Dine I
attributes.description: Really cool! Ready to make your first wine? Share the news with your friends!

attributes.title: Wine & Dine II
attributes.description: Our farm is perfect for making wine! We've got good sun and soil. Oh well, I've told you too much. Let's get to work!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has just begun making wine on the farm. Play Family Farm Seaside, and master the art of fine wine together!
attributes.hint: Find Grapes in the Store, grow them, and put them in the Wine Maker!

attributes.text: Add 3 Grapes to the Wine Maker

attributes.title: Wine & Dine II
attributes.description: Well done, farmer! You now know how to make wine. Let's make this experience complete!

attributes.title: Wine & Dine III
attributes.description: Grandma Blair knows best. She says: Like a husband needs a wife, wine needs a good cheese. Do you agree?
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has made some cheese to go with some tasty red wine. Play Family Farm Seaside, and see who has better tastes for these high class snacks!
attributes.hint: See the coins add up as you sell the wine! Use Cow Milk to produce Cheddar Cheese.

attributes.text: Sell 12 bottles of Wine from the Barn
Sell 8 Cheddar Cheese from the Barn

attributes.title: Wine & Dine III
attributes.description: Nice job! You just made a pretty penny by selling your products! Hooray, share the news!

attributes.title: Wine & Dine IV
attributes.description: There is quite a demand for White Wine as well. Do you know how to make a delicious and sweet White Wine?
attributes.opengraph_des: %s produced lots of tasty wine and is going to have a party with their neighbors! Don't miss out, play Family Farm Seaside now!
attributes.hint: Flip the switch of the Wine Maker to the White Wine position.

attributes.text: Add 3 White Grapes to the Wine Maker

attributes.title: Wine & Dine IV
attributes.description: Congratulations! You are a wine master! Invite your friends for your very own wine tasting!

attributes.title: Wine & Dine V
attributes.description: Baffalo Milk Cheese is a good match for White Wine. People in town just loooove it when we sell them together!
attributes.opengraph_des: Grandma just ordered some cheese to go with the wine %s produced on the farm. Join Family Farm Seaside and see if people in town will buy it!
attributes.hint: Remember to flip the switches of the machines in the right positions!

attributes.text: Sell 14 bottles of White Wine from the Barn
Sell 12 Buffalo Milk Cheese from the Barn

attributes.title: Wine & Dine V
attributes.description: Grandma really seems to have the nose for business. Share this to find out where it will lead to!

attributes.title: Flower Shop Frenzy
attributes.description: Oh no! A burglary happened at Fiona's Flower Shop in the village. They stole the whole stock of lavender there! Let's help out!
attributes.opengraph_des: The kindness of %s is legendary in Family Farm Seaside. You can also be a kind and helpful neighbor, come and play now!

attributes.title: Flower Shop Frenzy
attributes.description: Good work! You have lived up to your kind hearted reputation! Share the news!

attributes.title: Lunch Break I
attributes.description: Almost lunch time! Today is my turn to pick what kind of bread and cheese we eat. I vote Black Bread and Buffalo Cheese!
attributes.opengraph_des: Lunch time is approaching and %s is making something tasty. Check out Family Farm Seaside and see what's cookin'!
attributes.hint: Let's get started. Take it one step at a time!

attributes.title: Lunch Break I
attributes.description: Good work, farmer! This lunch will be ready in no time!

attributes.title: Lunch Break II
attributes.description: Sometimes I wish I could just go to the supermarket to get everything. But then again, it's us farmers who supply the supermarket!
attributes.opengraph_des: You like fresh bakery products? Well %s is making bread right on the farm. Join Family Farm Seaside and start making bread of your own!
attributes.hint: To make Bread, you need Milk, Eggs and the right kind of Flour.

attributes.title: Lunch Break II
attributes.description: Well done! Now, are you ready to put the Baker to work?

attributes.title: Lunch Break III
attributes.description: All right! If you turn on the machine, I will go and set the table!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is using farm ingredients to prepare a delicious meal. Don't be left out! Play Family Farm Seaside and get things ready together!
attributes.hint: Remember to flip the switches of the machines in the right positions!

attributes.text: Sell 12 loaves of Black Bread from the Barn
Sell 6 Cheddar Cheese from the Barn

attributes.title: Lunch Break III
attributes.description: Good work! All we need now is some Buffalo Milk Cheese to suit Darryl's taste!

attributes.title: Lunch Break IV
attributes.description: Oh - we still forgot Buffalo Milk Cheese for lunch. How could I forget my favorite cheese?
attributes.opengraph_des: Quick! %s is finishing the final preparations of what is looking like a tasty lunch! Join Family Farm Seaside and you can get in on the meal!

attributes.text: Sell 14 Buffalo Milk Cheese from the Barn

attributes.title: Lunch Break IV
attributes.description: Well done and congratulations! Thanks to your help, lunch is ready! Have a quick bite and see what happens next!

attributes.title: Beef it up I
attributes.description: Are you ready for some more animals to take your farm to the next level? Guess what I'm about to show you. It says: Moo!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just got some cattle for the farm. Check it out in Family Farm Seaside now.
attributes.hint: Need more XP to level up faster? Grow fast crops and visit lots of neighbors!

attributes.title: Beef it up I
attributes.description: Well done! This cattle will definitely beef up your farm! Share the news with your friends!

attributes.title: Beef it up II
attributes.description: Cattle have a strict diet. They only eat Pasture! Luckily for them, Pasture doesn't take much time to grow.
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has some new cattle on the farm and they are now grazing on some pasture. Join Family Farm Seaside and get some cattle of your own!
attributes.hint: All meat cows eat Pasture.

attributes.title: Beef it up II
attributes.description: Good work! Are you ready to feed the Limousin Cattle?

attributes.title: Beef it up III
attributes.description: Ol' MacDonald keeps telling me how important beef is for children like me. It has something to do with protein.
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is working in the pasture. Lend a helping hand with your own farm in Family Farm Seaside!
attributes.hint: Feed Pasture to the Limousin Cattle, and it will produce Beef.

attributes.text: Feed Pasture to the Cattle 3 times

attributes.title: Beef it up III
attributes.description: Good work! Beef gives you profit. Later in the game, you can also use it to make other products. Share this news!

attributes.title: Beef it up IV
attributes.description: Actually, I don't like meat that much. Unless... They put it on a pizza, with all my favorite farm products!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is about to make delicious pizza! Come and play to get your slice before all the other neighbors eat it all!

attributes.title: Beef it up IV
attributes.description: Congratulations! You now have all it takes to give to Ol'MacDonald, so he can prepare a nice veggie & beef pizza for Darryl! Share the news!

attributes.title: Beef it up V
attributes.description: You know what? Let's see if Ol' MacDonald can make me my other favorite, Mexican Pizza!
attributes.opengraph_des: Ever tried Mexican Pizza? It is super tasty, and %s has just taken one right out of the oven. Play Family Farm Seaside, and make your own!

attributes.title: Beef it up V
attributes.description: Good work! Darryl can be sure of a tasty and healty meal now. Let's see what else we can make besides pizza!

attributes.title: Grandma's Burgers I
attributes.description: That's it! Grandma Blair has always spoiled me with her super secret burger recipe! And now she's starting a brand of her own!
attributes.opengraph_des: Grandma has decided she wants to open her own burger chain and %s is already helping the business! Play Family Farm Seaside to get in on the deal!

attributes.text: Get a Burger Machine from the Store

attributes.title: Grandma's Burgers I
attributes.description: Congratulations! You're really taking farming (and burgers) to the next level! Share a burger with your friends!

attributes.title: Grandma's Burgers II
attributes.description: Grandma only wants the healthiest bread for her burgers. That's the bread from our farm!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s healthy burgers are famous throughout the country! You can do it too, join Family Farm Seaside now!

attributes.title: Grandma's Burgers II
attributes.description: Good work, farmer! This is going to be an awesome and healthy Burger! Share a bite with your friends!

attributes.title: Grandma's Burgers III
attributes.description: All right... Bread: check! Cheese: Check! Burger Machine: ready to roll!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is unstoppable with the Burger Machine! Come and check it out now!

attributes.text: Add 3 loaves of Wheat Bread to the Burger Machine
Add 3 Cheddar Cheese to Burger Machine

attributes.title: Grandma's Burgers III
attributes.description: Holy cheezers! You are going like a rocket! Share the news with your friends!

attributes.title: Grandma's Burgers IV
attributes.description: Great! I just found out Grandma is also putting Steak Burgers on her menu. That's another way to eat beef other than pizza.
attributes.opengraph_des: What's better than a burger.. How about a Steak Burger fresh from the farm? %s already has some ready! Play Family Farm Seaside!
attributes.hint: Flip the switch of Burger Machine to the Steak Burger position.

attributes.text: Add 3 loaves of Wheat Bread to the Burger Machine
Add 3 Beef to the Burger Machine

attributes.title: Grandma's Burgers IV
attributes.description: You are awesome! Your Steak Burgers are the best in town! And it would be even more awesome with a drink! Share this with your friends!

attributes.title: Grandma's Burgers V
attributes.description: Drinks! Grandma thought of that. No less than 3 types of drinks will be available at Grandma's Burgers Inc!
attributes.opengraph_des: Nothing is as refreshing as some fresh juice! %s has got the idea! Check out the farm on Family Farm Seaside!
attributes.hint: Flip the switch of the Juice Machine so it makes the products of your choice!

attributes.title: Grandma's Burgers V
attributes.description: Great job! Share some fresh juice with your friends! Ready for more adventures?

attributes.title: Grandma's Burgers VI
attributes.description: All right! Time to see if we get some profit out of Grandma's Burgers Inc!
attributes.opengraph_des: The burger business is booming here in Family Farm Seaside. Play now and see what %s has done with fresh farm burgers!

attributes.text: Sell 15 Cheese Burgers from the Barn
Sell 15 Steak Burgers from the Barn
Sell 6500 coins worth of goods from the Barn

attributes.title: Grandma's Burgers VI
attributes.description: Well done! You're getting loaded with profit! What will you do with all this cash?

attributes.title: Barbecue Ball I
attributes.description: Wow! Profits from Grandma's Burgers Inc are coming in! This calls for a celebration that fits the occasion. Barbecue time!!
attributes.opengraph_des: The grill is out on the farm and ready to be used. Play Family Farm Seaside and see what BBQ plans %s has been thinking of!

attributes.title: Barbecue Ball I
attributes.description: Good work! You are now ready to start the world's greatest barbecue!

attributes.title: Barbecue Ball II
attributes.description: Let's beef up the process. No barbecue can do without meat!
attributes.opengraph_des: Hungry yet? %s is going to have some tasty BBQ to share with all the Family Farm Seaside neighbors. Are you playing yet? Join now!

attributes.title: Barbecue Ball II
attributes.description: Good work! Are you ready for the next step on the road to your dream barbecue?

attributes.title: Barbecue Ball III
attributes.description: I just saw Grandma Blair. She's already hungry too! She says we're behind schedule. Let's catch up fast with ketchup!
attributes.opengraph_des: What is easy to make and can be a good sauce? That's right, ketchup! %s has the right idea. Play Family Farm Seaside and check it out now!

attributes.title: Barbecue Ball III
attributes.description: Excellent! We will soon be able to make ketchup! Share the news with your friends!

attributes.title: Cheese Please II
attributes.description: Hmm, this is the first time to make Cheese myself! But believe me, this will be the most delicious Cheese you have ever tasted!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s's Cheddar Cheese smells great! You can also produce amazing products in Family Farm Seaside, come and play!
attributes.hint: Put Milk in the Cheese Master to make Cheddar Cheese.

attributes.text: Add 3 bottles of Milk to Cheese Master
Sell 3 Cheddar Cheese from the Barn

attributes.title: Cheese Please II
attributes.description: Well done! You definitely scored points in Grandma Blair's book! Keep playing to find out what's next!

attributes.title: Barbecue Ball IV
attributes.description: Real farm ketchup is handmade. Well, at least the machine that produces it is handmade here at the seaside!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just made some fresh ketchup from tomatoes on the farm! Play Family Farm Seaside and make some of your own!
attributes.hint: Your Sauce Machine will make many other sauces later!

attributes.text: Add 3 Tomatoes to the Sauce Machine

attributes.title: Barbecue Ball IV
attributes.description: Great! You truly are a BBQ Master! Share the news and some ketchup!

attributes.title: Barbecue Ball V
attributes.description: Oh yes. Grandma also reminded me that the barbecue has to match with the philosophy of her burger brand. That means: healthy drinks!
attributes.opengraph_des: Nothing is as healthy and juicy as your freshly squeezed orange juice! Play Family Farm Seaside and share a glass with %s!

attributes.title: Barbecue Ball V
attributes.description: Nicely done, farmer! Nothing is as healthy and juicy as your freshly pressed orange juice!

attributes.title: Barbecue Ball VI
attributes.description: Hey, I see you have some tomatoes left, let's use them for burgers!
attributes.opengraph_des: No worries, here on Family Farm Seaside, we have them both covered! %s just made beef and veggie burgers so everyone can join in on the fun!

attributes.text: Add 3 Tomatoes in the Burger Machine
Add 3 Wheat Bread in the Burger Machine

attributes.title: Barbecue Ball VI
attributes.description: Great work, farmer! Both meat and veggie lovers are welcome to join the barbecue! Spread the news!

attributes.title: Barbecue Ball VII
attributes.description: Bummer! The weather forecast says it's going to rain! Guess we'd better put the barbecue on hold for now.
attributes.opengraph_des: Uh oh, the BBQ plans are going to be ruined by rain. Play Family Farm Seaside, and help %s come up with an alternative!

attributes.text: Sell 12 Veggie Burgers from the Barn
Sell 4000 coins worth of goods from the Barn

attributes.title: Barbecue Ball VII
attributes.description: Well done! At least you got many coins out of this project! Share the news!

attributes.title: Pitaya Aid I
attributes.description: Ol'MacDonald lost his reading glasses this morning. I want to help him. Pitaya is said to improve eyesight, you'll see!
attributes.opengraph_des: Have you ever had a pitaya? Come join %s and grow some of your own in Family Farm Seaside!

attributes.title: Pitaya Aid I
attributes.description: Good work! Thanks to you, Ol'MacDonald should soon be able to read without glasses!

attributes.title: Pitaya Aid II
attributes.description: Ol'MacDonald's reading glasses have been found! Grandma sat on them. Guess my Pitaya Jam is not needed anymore, but let's make it anyway.
attributes.opengraph_des: What can you do with a pitaya you ask? Well, %s knows that it makes excellent jam! Play Family Farm Seaside now and make some together!

attributes.text: Sell 22 jars of Pitaya Jam from the Barn
Place a Sundial on the ranch

attributes.title: Pitaya Aid II
attributes.description: Well done! Spread the news and share some bread with pitaya jam with your friends!

attributes.title: Language of Love I
attributes.description: My friend Penny is so in love she hasn't eaten all week! We must do something!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just made some love fruit for a friend feeling down. What is a love fruit you ask? Play Family Farm Seaside and find out!

attributes.title: Language of Love I
attributes.description: Good work! If Penny doesn't eat your Love Fruit, she'll eat nothing! Let's hope it works!

attributes.title: Language of Love II
attributes.description: Shocking! Penny is not eating the Love Fruit! What if we make cakes with it, and also check if there is mail?
attributes.opengraph_des: Nothing can cheer someone's day up like a piece of cake, and %s just bought a cake machine. Play Family Farm Seaside and enjoy some cake together!

attributes.title: Language of Love II
attributes.description: Well done! Penny will not be able to resist this!

attributes.title: Language of Love III
attributes.description: Actually I've never tasted Love Cakes before. Let's make some extra. Do you want a taste too?
attributes.opengraph_des: No it's not a question, %s just made Love Cakes. Don't know what those are? Play Family Farm Seaside and find out!

attributes.text: Add 3 Love Fruits to the Cake Machine
Add 3 Sacks of Wheat Flour to the Cake Machine
Add 3 Eggs to the Cake Machine

attributes.title: Language of Love III
attributes.description: This is going great! Soon you will be able to taste Love Cakes for the first time in your life! Share the news!

attributes.title: Language of Love IV
attributes.description: Oh my Gosh. I just tasted this cake and I can already feel my heart pounding! Better sell the rest, this is powerful stuff indeed!
attributes.opengraph_des: Uh oh, it seems %s has made more cake than was needed. That's no problem! Play Family Farm Seaside to help with the cake!

attributes.text: Sell 25 Love Cakes from the Barn

attributes.title: Language of Love IV
attributes.description: Great work! But don't forget to warn your friends of the power of Love Cakes!

attributes.title: Language of Love V
attributes.description: As for Penny, I think Black Forest Cake may help to make her start eating again. She used to go crazy for it!
attributes.opengraph_des: This is Black Forest Cake! Do you know how to make that? %s does and has just made some in Family Farm Seaside. Play now and enjoy some together!
attributes.hint: Add Gisela Cherries,Wheat Flour and Eggs in the Cake machine to produce Black Forest Cakes

attributes.text: Sell 5 Black Forest Cakes from the Barn

attributes.title: Language of Love V
attributes.description: Well done! Share the news and a piece of Black Forest Cake!

attributes.title: Language of Love VI
attributes.description: This love problem is giving me ideas for a new product. Let's make a beautiful Lovers' Breakfast set of jams and flowers!
attributes.opengraph_des: Flowers and jams make lovely presents! %s had the right idea! Play Family Farm Seaside and make gifts for your friends too!

attributes.text: Sell 20 jars of Pitaya Jam from the Barn
Sell 8 jars of Cherry Jam from the Barn

attributes.title: Language of Love VI
attributes.description: Good work! Did you see how fast those jams were sold? It's a hit!

attributes.title: Language of Love VII
attributes.description: These flowers need a beautiful basket. Let's make it look as loveable as a cute little chicklet!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has bought some items to make the farm more beautiful! Play Family Farm Seaside and check it out now!

attributes.text: Fertilize on your neighbors' farms 30 times

attributes.title: Language of Love VII
attributes.description: Well done! You really have an eye for beautiful designs and decorations!

attributes.title: Language of Love VIII
attributes.description: I gave the fragrance a careful thought. And I think we need Lavenders because they smell great, and Love Fruit for the experience!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s's farm is one of the most fragrant places I have ever visited. Play Family Farm Seaside and smell the fragrance of both lavander and love fruit!

attributes.title: Language of Love VIII
attributes.description: Great work! You have a good nose! Share the news and the fragrance with your friends!

attributes.title: Good Life I
attributes.description: Grandma and Ol'MacDonald want me to get drinks. No wine for Ol'MacDonald! He says his liver can't handle alcohol.
attributes.opengraph_des: After work, you need something to cool you off and help you relax. Be it apple juice or wine, %s's farm has it all. Play Family Farm Seaside now!

attributes.title: Good Life I
attributes.description: Excellent! Only the best juice and wine are good enough, and you have just made them!

attributes.title: Good Life II
attributes.description: Now they want something to nibble on. And to sit on. Oh, those old folks, sweet and all, but demanding!
attributes.opengraph_des: Got a case of the munchies? Come check out %s's farm in Family Farm Seaside! There are enough snacks for everyone!

attributes.title: Good Life II
attributes.description: Good work! You really make life easier for Grandma Blair and Ol'MacDonald!

attributes.title: Daily Fodder I
attributes.description: Time for my daily round around the farm! I'll start with the rabbits today!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just got done feeding some cute rabbits on the farm! Play Family Farm Seaside and get some rabbits of your own!

attributes.text: Sell 38 bundles of Angora Hair from the Barn

attributes.title: Daily Fodder I
attributes.description: Great work! What would this farm do without you? Share the news!

attributes.title: Daily Fodder II
attributes.description: On to the sheep now! I'm sure they are just as hungry as the rabbits.
attributes.opengraph_des: %s was feeding all the sheep on the farm, and was wondering how many sheep you have on your farm! See who has more in Family Farm Seaside!

attributes.text: Sell 38 bundles of Wool from the Barn

attributes.title: Daily Fodder II
attributes.description: Well done! Every sheep in the farm loves you. Share the love with your neighbors!

attributes.title: Picnic Pals I
attributes.description: Sometimes, I look out over the fields and think what a great day for a picnic!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s leveled up again and is now level 19! You also have what it takes, join Family Farm Seaside and become a successful farmer!

attributes.title: Picnic Pals I
attributes.description: Good work! This will be an awesome picnic. Ready for more?

attributes.title: Daily Bread III
attributes.description: The farm is where you learn the most. Some of the kids in school don't know that chickens eat corn. Can you believe that?
attributes.opengraph_des: Collecting eggs is one of the fundamentals of farming. %s has already got it down. Play Family Farm Seaside and learn farming together!
attributes.hint: Buy a Chicken Coop in the store, in the animals tab.

attributes.text: Feed Corn to the Chicken 3 times

attributes.title: Daily Bread III
attributes.description: Congratulations! You have a new animal on your farm! Share this with your friends!

attributes.title: Daily Bread IV
attributes.description: A Chicken Coop can hold 5 Chickens at most. The more Chickens, the faster they can produce Eggs.
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is on a roll with the Chicken Coop! Come and play Family Farm Seaside to have your own Chicken Coop!
attributes.hint: Buy 2 more Chickens and tap Chicken Coop to put them in

attributes.title: Daily Bread IV
attributes.description: Good work! You're on a roll! Find out what happens next!

attributes.title: Picnic Pals II
attributes.description: Rumble rumble?! what was that?! Not a thunder I hope! Oh, haha... it's the sound of my own stomach! Better pack some serious food!
attributes.opengraph_des: Is your stomach rumbling too? %s took care of that by making some Steak Burgers. Play Family Farm Seaside and you can make some of your own!

attributes.title: Picnic Pals II
attributes.description: Well done! Thanks to you, no one will go hungry! Find out what happens next!

attributes.title: Picnic Pals III
attributes.description: How do you like your steak burgers? I like mine with mayonnaise!
attributes.opengraph_des: The great thing about Mayo is that it is easy to make, and %s knows exactly how to get the ingredient! Play Family Farm Seaside make some of your own!

attributes.title: Picnic Pals III
attributes.description: Good work, farmer! Are you ready to make Ketchup?

attributes.title: Picnic Pals IV
attributes.description: Some people put Ketchup on everything. So, just in case, let's take a lot of that to the picnic!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is preparing to go on a picnic. Don't get left out, play Family Farm Seaside and join in on the fun!

attributes.title: Picnic Pals IV
attributes.description: Excellent, farmer! Keep up the good work and share this news with your friends!

attributes.title: Picnic Pals V
attributes.description: And finally, especially for Grandma Blair, take some cakes, with fruit juice of course!
attributes.opengraph_des: What is better than %s's Black Forest Cake? Well yours of course! Play Family Farm Seaside and show everyone who can really bake cake!

attributes.title: Picnic Pals V
attributes.description: Great work! This will make the greatest Black Forest Cake ever!

attributes.title: Picnic Pals VI
attributes.description: All the ingredients are ready. All we have to do is put the machines to work! Will you do the honors?
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is about to enjoy this wonderful picnic, and there is just enough room for you! Play Family Farm Seaside and join the picnic fun!

attributes.text: Produce 8 Black Forest Cakes with Gisela Cherries
Sell 8000 coins worth of goods from the Barn

attributes.title: Picnic Pals VI
attributes.description: Well done! You prepared the whole picnic. Do you want to see what happens next?

attributes.title: Party Hardy I
attributes.description: Want to know why Felicia is so optimistic lately? She's been invited to a costume party!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is getting ready to have a costume party. Were you invited? Just play Family Farm Seaside and make your own costume to join the fun!

attributes.text: Produce 45 Ostrich Feathers to make masks

attributes.title: Party Hardy I
attributes.description: Awesome! Keep on playing to find out what happens next!

attributes.title: Party Hardy II
attributes.description: Felicia will take some fresh roasted Salami to the party. But if she does so, don't forget to prepare Peppermint for the guests!
attributes.opengraph_des: How cool would it be to make your own mints? Well %s just did and is loving it! Play Family Farm Seaside and get minty!

attributes.title: Party Hardy II
attributes.description: Great work! Do you want to know if the Peppermint really worked? Keep playing and find out!

attributes.title: Party Hardy III
attributes.description: Beef salami is quite popular at the party. I heard the DJ loves beef salami! Maybe we should make some and share it at the party!
attributes.opengraph_des: No party is fun without snacks. Join %s in Family Farm Seaside and make some party snacks together!

attributes.text: Add 3 Beef to the Salami Machine

attributes.title: Party Hardy III
attributes.description: Excellent! Share the news with your friends and see what happens next!

attributes.title: Party Hardy IV
attributes.description: I'm so happy! Everyone loves the beef salami! You know what? I bet they will also like cheese. Let's make some cheese!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s's party is going to be such a success, especially with snacks like Wine and Cheese. Play Family Farm Seaside and get in on the tasty treats!

attributes.title: Party Hardy IV
attributes.description: Awesome! Quickly share this message and see what else happened at the party!

attributes.title: Party Hardy V
attributes.description: Wow, the cheese was also a big success! But wait, I forgot to prepare some drinks. Oh no, I hope I still have time to put some drinks on the table!
attributes.opengraph_des: What good is a party without some good friends? %s is waiting for you now at the party on Family Farm Seaside!

attributes.title: Party Hardy V
attributes.description: Good work! Want to know what happened next at the party? Keep on playing, and find out!

attributes.title: Party Hardy VI
attributes.description: At the end of the party, some mysterious guests came.
attributes.opengraph_des: At a costume party who isn't mysterious? Join %s in Family Farm Seaside and learn how to make costumes of your own!
attributes.hint: Produce some Peacock Feathers to make masks for the mysterious guests.

attributes.title: Party Hardy VI
attributes.description: Well done, farmer! Thanks to you, the mysterious guests will have a wonderful evening!

attributes.title: Party Hardy VII
attributes.description: Apparently the mysterious guests are friends of the DJ. They had the best night of their life with Felicia and the DJ!
attributes.opengraph_des: Whew! What a night that was! %s had the coolest farm party ever. Now you can play Family Farm Seaside and prepare to have your own party!

attributes.text: Sell 10,000 coins worth of goods from the Barn

attributes.title: Party Hardy VII
attributes.description: Awesome work, farmer! Share the success with your friends, and find out what happened the next morning!

attributes.title: Party Hardy Aftermath
attributes.description: Did you know Grandma was one of the mysterious guests? What a surprise! She must be exhausted, because she's still on the bed. Let me make some coffee for her.
attributes.opengraph_des: After a late night out, a fresh coffee can help get the day going. Join %s for a fresh cup of coffee in Family Farm Seaside!

attributes.title: Party Hardy Aftermath
attributes.description: Great work! Your coffee has healing effects for those suffering from fatigue. Share a cup with your neighbors!

attributes.title: White Turkey I
attributes.description: Hello my friend. Today I am a little hungover... I mean, tired! Can you do me a favor and take care of the turkey? Thanks!
attributes.opengraph_des: What was that sound? Gobble gobble! It's a turkey! %s just got a new addition on the farm. Check it out in Family Farm Seaside now!

attributes.text: Place a White Turkey on the farm

attributes.title: White Turkey I
attributes.description: Good work! Let everybody know you now have a Turkey in your farm!

attributes.title: White Turkey II
attributes.description: You know, sometimes life can be great even when you're tired! By the way, we're working on burgers and sausages.
attributes.opengraph_des: When you are feeling a little down, I have just the thing. A fresh serving of Family Farm Seaside should cheer you right up! Join %s and play now!

attributes.text: Feed Rice to the Turkey 3 times

attributes.title: White Turkey II
attributes.description: Well done! Keep playing to find out what you can do with Turkey meat!

attributes.title: White Turkey III
attributes.description: Can you finish the burgers and sausages for me? I need to do my hair. I have a date! :-) !
attributes.opengraph_des: Felicia is getting ready for a date and %s had to help finishing things on the farm. Play Family Farm Seaside now, and lend a helping hand!
attributes.hint: Produce Turkey Burgers in the Burger Machine and Turkey Sausage in the Salami Machine

attributes.title: White Turkey III
attributes.description: Awesome! You can really do amazing things with Turkey meat! Share your experience!

attributes.title: Felicia's Date I
attributes.description: Felicia's date is coming soon! The guy is taking her to a concert. I'll make sure they have enough to chew on!
attributes.opengraph_des: Don't want to get hungry in the middle of the show, help %s make some snacks for evening. Play Family Farm Seaside now!

attributes.title: Felicia's Date I
attributes.description: Great job! Never leave home on an empty stomach! Share this with your friends, and continue to find out what happens on the date!

attributes.title: Felicia's Date II
attributes.description: Felicia wants to smell like Lavender for her date. Guess if the guy does not like Lavender, it's not going to work!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s knows what can make a good perfume. Play Family Farm Seaside and see how useful lavander can be!

attributes.title: Felicia's Date II
attributes.description: Good work! Thanks to you, Felicia really smells great on her date! Share the news and find out what happens next!

attributes.title: Felicia's Date III
attributes.description: I'll also prepare a gift that Felicia can give to the guy. How about a nice fresh cake?
attributes.opengraph_des: There's almost nothing better than a fresh baked cake. Play Family Farm Seaside and join %s to help make some cakes together.

attributes.title: Felicia's Date III
attributes.description: Well done! Let everyone know that you have a fertile Lemon Tree now!

attributes.title: Felicia's Date IV
attributes.description: I'd better hire Cupid for this too. For all I know, a Lemon Cake could stand for boringness or promiscuity or something even worse..
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is looking for Cupid's arrows on the farm. Perhaps you could help out! Play Family Farm Seaside now!

attributes.text: Collect 7 Cupid's Arrows to help Destiny
Produce 5 Lemon Cakes as a gift

attributes.title: Felicia's Date IV
attributes.description: Awesome! The guy will be thrilled with the Lemon Cake! Share the news with your friends!

attributes.title: Grandma's Birthday I
attributes.description: Oops! I think about my life so much that I almost forgot something crucial! Grandma's birthday is coming. And she's throwing a party!
attributes.opengraph_des: How about some love fruits? Never heard of them? Then join %s in Family Farm Seaside and learn how to harvest some of your own!
attributes.hint: Use Love Fruits to decorate the house, and prepare a flower bouquet with Red Roses. Grandma will love it!

attributes.title: Grandma's Birthday I
attributes.description: Good work! Grandma Blair will be most delighted. All thanks to you!

attributes.title: Grandma's Birthday II
attributes.description: Grandma invited all her lady friends. Many of them seem to like Daisies and feathers as decorations!
attributes.opengraph_des: Daisies and feathers make good decorations! Ask %s how the farm looks with daises and feathers, they just redecorated! Play Family Farm Seaside now!

attributes.title: Grandma's Birthday II
attributes.description: Great work! This will be an awesome party for Grandma Blair. Tell all your friends!

attributes.title: Grandma's Birthday II
attributes.description: Nobody actually knows how old Grandma will turn. Some say she must be 100. But personally, I think 10 candles on a cake will do!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s needs more candles for grandma's birthday party. Lend a helping hand and send a few more candles in Family Farm Seaside now!

attributes.title: Grandma's Birthday III
attributes.description: Awesome job! No matter how many candles you use, your cakes are all equally delicious! Share the news!

attributes.title: Grandma's Birthday III
attributes.description: We're making cakes for the party. Don't forget to include Almond Cake, that's Grandma's favorite!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has so many cakes, the whole farm gets to enjoy some. Play Family Farm Seaside and see if they still have you favorite flavor left!
attributes.hint: Produce Black Forest Cakes with Gisela Cherries, and produce Almon Cakes with Almonds.

attributes.title: Grandma's Birthday IV
attributes.description: Great work! Grandma Blair and all her friends will be delighted with the cakes!

attributes.title: Grandma's Birthday IV
attributes.description: Let's give Grandma's friends a taste of the best that seaside farm life has to offer!
attributes.opengraph_des: The best burgers are not only homemade, they are made on the farm. Join %s in Family Farm Seaside to enjoy this delight before it's too late!

attributes.title: Grandma's Birthday V
attributes.description: Well done! Tell everyone you have the best steaks in town!

attributes.title: Grandma's Birthday V
attributes.description: I wonder if Grandma's friends like Turkey too. I guess there's only one way to find out!
attributes.opengraph_des: The guests are almost here! Quick help %s finish up a few last minute things before the party starts in Family Farm Seaside!

attributes.title: Grandma's Birthday VI
attributes.description: Good work! Share the news with your friends!

attributes.title: Grandma's Birthday VI
attributes.description: We're almost done now. Just missing tasty and healthy drinks and food. Let's start with the jam!
attributes.opengraph_des: What is tasty and healthy you ask? Blueberries of course! Play Family Farm Seaside with %s and enjoy some together!

attributes.title: Grandma's Birthday VII
attributes.description: Great work! Thanks to you, everyone will be able to enjoy your tasty Blueberry Jam at the party!

attributes.title: Grandma's Birthday VII
attributes.description: Last but not least, let's make two of Grandma's favorite juices.
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just cleared out the barn making room for some more fresh fruit juices. Play Family Farm Seaside and check it out now!

attributes.text: Sell 12,000 coins worth of goods from Barn

attributes.title: Grandma's Birthday VIII
attributes.description: Awesome! Thanks to you, Grandma Blair's party totally rocks! Tell everyone!

attributes.title: Felicia's Date V
attributes.description: Felicia's going on a date again! The guy invited her to his place to watch a movie! And I'm asked to provide the catering!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is on strict catering duties at the farm. Let's lend a hand! Play Family Farm Seaside now!

attributes.title: Felicia's Date V
attributes.description: Great work! Thanks to you, Felicia and the guy can eat tasty Cheeseburgers while watching the movie! Let everybody know!

attributes.title: Felicia's Date VI
attributes.description: Oh wait. What if he doesn't like Cheeseburgers? Better prepare an alternative too!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just learned how to make turkey burgers. Play Family Farm Seaside and see if you can get the recipe too!

attributes.title: Felicia's Date VI
attributes.description: Well done! But isn't there anything more suitable to eat while watching a movie? Continue to find out!

attributes.title: Felicia's Date VII
attributes.description: No movie without popcorn! In this case sweet popcorn, made with farm style sugar. It takes a few steps to make, but it's worth it!
attributes.opengraph_des: Want to learn how to make some great movie snacks? Join %s in Family Farm Seaside and get the best recipes on the farm!

attributes.title: Felicia's Date VII
attributes.description: Awesome! Tell all your friends and get ready to make sugar!

attributes.title: Felicia's Date VIII
attributes.description: The finest popcorn only needs 2 things: Corn, and Sugar. We can make that!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just made some popcorn. There is enough for everyone! Play Family Farm Seaside and check it out!

attributes.text: Add 3 Cane to the Sugar Machine

attributes.title: Felicia's Date VIII
attributes.description: Great work! Share the news with your friends and see what happens next!

attributes.title: Felicia's Date IX
attributes.description: And of course, Felicia and the guy will want a drink. Orange Juice is not only healthy, but also very tasty!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has made a lot of food, but needs a good film to watch. Send one now in Family Farm Seaside!

attributes.title: Felicia's Date IX
attributes.description: Well done! Will this really be the beginning of a new life for Felicia?

attributes.title: Think Big II
attributes.description: More crops means more business. With some farm-aids, your crops are ready for harvest real quick!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is making some big things happen on the farm these days. Play Family Farm Seaside and check it out now!
attributes.hint: Cherry Trees are slow-growing. Plant more trees to get more fruits at a time!

attributes.title: Think Big II
attributes.description: Well done! You are master of your crops! Share some of your newfound power!

attributes.title: The Big Launch I
attributes.description: It's really windy today so it's a great day to fly a kite! But I can't find mine anywhere. Please can you help me look? If we find it, we can fly it! Let's make some space.
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just found a kite while playing Family Farm Seaside and soon they will be able to fly it. Join in with the fun, play Family Farm Seaside now!

attributes.title: The Big Launch I
attributes.description: Yes, we found it but I think its broken, maybe we can mend it. I'm glad we have the extra space to fly it in!

attributes.title: The Big Launch II
attributes.description: I remember why it is broken, I lost control of it and it crashed into the trees. I better harvest the fruit just in case it happens again.
attributes.opengraph_des: opengraph

attributes.text: Have 2 Peach Trees on your farm

attributes.title: The Big Launch II
attributes.description: Ok, that's the trees cleared. I told Grandma and she won't let me play until my jobs are done. Better get going...

attributes.title: The Big Launch III
attributes.description: Some of this Sugar Beet will actually come in handy for fixing my kite, I need something strong and I think this will do the trick
attributes.opengraph_des: opengraph

attributes.title: The Big Launch III
attributes.description: The kite is looking good! I hope it will hold when the kite is flying. Let's see what else is on my list for today.

attributes.title: The Big Launch IV
attributes.description: I don't mind working with Maple Sugar, I always do a "taste test" just to make sure it's ok hehe, do you want to check it's ok as well?
attributes.opengraph_des: opengraph

attributes.title: The Big Launch IV
attributes.description: Superb, there is nothing wrong with that. Uh oh, sugar rush!

attributes.title: The Big Launch V
attributes.description: Felicia has offered to decorate my kite if I do some of her jobs, I can't paint so seems like a good deal to me. What do you think?
attributes.opengraph_des: opengraph

attributes.title: The Big Launch V
attributes.description: My kite is looking good, Felicia painted a monster on it. I think it will look quite scary in the sky.

attributes.title: The Big Launch VI
attributes.description: I think the kite needs a monster's tail. I can get some thread from the flour bags when I make the flour on my list
attributes.opengraph_des: opengraph

attributes.title: The Big Launch VI
attributes.description: Those bags were so heavy, thank you for the help. T-minus 2 jobs till launch time.

attributes.title: The Big Launch VII
attributes.description: Felicia has invited some of our friends to also fly their kites. We can make some extra items and make this kite have a little launch party.
attributes.opengraph_des: opengraph

attributes.title: The Big Launch VII
attributes.description: I love fresh bread! Its launch time, I'm really excited, I hope it flies well, fingers crossed.

attributes.title: The Big Launch VIII
attributes.description: It flies, I am so happy and no crashes yet. Let's get some juice for our guests, flying kites makes you thirsty. Can you fly the kite for me?
attributes.opengraph_des: opengraph

attributes.title: The Big Launch VIII
attributes.description: They feel much better after the juice. All the kites look great in the sky, mine looks the scariest though, Felicia did a great job.

attributes.title: Candy Perfection I
attributes.description: I just received a "Self-Assembly Candy Machine 3000". I ordered it from e-barn.com Quick, grab your screwdriver!
attributes.opengraph_des: opengraph

attributes.title: Candy Perfection I
attributes.description: Fantastic, this machine is very promising! I am glad to officially announce the launch of Grandma's Candy Shop!

attributes.title: Candy Perfection II
attributes.description: The first thing we need is good quality traditional ingredients. Ah ha, this is my little secret to make sweet things!
attributes.opengraph_des: opengraph

attributes.title: Candy Perfection II
attributes.description: Think about all the colorful candies we can make out of this magnificent sugar!

attributes.title: Candy Perfection III
attributes.description: Now that I don't have to worry about my teeth any more, I can do some research for making the perfect candy! This will involve a lot of tasting!
attributes.opengraph_des: opengraph

attributes.text: Add 3 Sugar to the Candy Machine
Add 3 Grapes to the Candy Machine

attributes.title: Candy Perfection III
attributes.description: Let me pull this trigger and push this button and...there you go! What tasty delicacies came out of my creative mind?

attributes.title: Candy Perfection IV
attributes.description: No no, they are not good enough! I will try again until they're perfect, I am a perfectionist!
attributes.opengraph_des: opengraph

attributes.title: Candy Perfection IV
attributes.description: Ok let me put my dentures aside and tuck in! I made it, they taste fantastic!

attributes.title: HUGE Coffee Boost
attributes.description: Oh no! I am running late! Quick help me to prepare some coffee while I put my things together!
attributes.opengraph_des: opengraph

attributes.title: HUGE Coffee Boost
attributes.description: Mmm, that's just what I needed! I am ready for the day!

attributes.title: The 3 Wise Farmers
attributes.description: Listen Darryl, the 3 oldest farmers we know are coming for a visit. Each one of them has a guilty pleasure. Please prepare their favorite food and maybe you will even learn something from them!
attributes.opengraph_des: opengraph

attributes.title: The 3 Wise Farmers
attributes.description: Great job! Thanks to you, I am sure that they won't mind sharing their precious farming secrets

attributes.title: Farming is Magic II
attributes.description: Here it goes: I know a way to make your crops ripe in no-time! Watch and be amazed!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s\'s is showing off their green thumb by using the Fertilizers! Join Family Farm Seaside to become an expert farmer too!
attributes.hint: To fertilize an unripe crop, tap on it and choose the fertilizer you want to use.

attributes.text: Place a Beehive on your farm
Get the Fertilizer from your Gift Box

attributes.title: Farming is Magic II
attributes.description: Way to grow, farmer! These fertilizers sure are handy, aren't they? Connect with Facebook and share this with your friends!

attributes.title: Get Juicy III
attributes.description: I want to use the machine to make another kind of juice for Grandma. What shall we make, maybe Orange Juice? Any ideas?
attributes.opengraph_des: %s planted an Orange Tree and is about to make Orange Juice! Help out by joining Family Farm Seaside now!
attributes.hint: Find Orange Trees in the Store!

attributes.title: Get Juicy III
attributes.description: Good work! You have Oranges now. Are you ready to make juice out of them?

attributes.title: Busy Bees
attributes.description: Hi, I'm Felicia, Darryl's sister. Do you like insects? We can watch the busy bees! Stand still and maybe they won't sting!
attributes.opengraph_des: Nothing better than some fresh honey! %s already has some ready to be taste tested! Don't miss the chance to try some together in Family Farm Seaside!
attributes.hint: The bees will fly to ripe Clover and pollinate it to make Honey!

attributes.text: Place a Beehive on your farm
Produce and collect 1 jar of Honey

attributes.title: Busy Bees
attributes.description: Sweet job! Don't sell your Honey yet. You will need it soon!

attributes.title: Apple Tree
attributes.description: An apple a day keeps the doctor away! Start your own mini orchard and reap the benefits for years to come.
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is surely keeping the doctor away thanks to the delicious Apples just harvested! Lead a healthy life, join Family Farm Seaside now!
attributes.hint: To water a tree, tap a tree's base and choose the watering can you want to use.

attributes.text: Get a Watering Can from your giftbox
Water the tree with a Super Watering Can

attributes.title: Apple Tree
attributes.description: Well done! Play on to find out what you can do with the Apples.

attributes.title: Jam in Store I
attributes.description: The local village store is ordering jam from us. Are you ready for this?
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is a master of bees and jam! Give it a go, join Family Farm Seaside now!
attributes.hint: Oh, have I forget to tell you that bees only pollinate ripe Clover?

attributes.text: Purchase a Jam Machine from store
Add 1 jars of Honey to Jam Machine

attributes.title: Jam in Store I
attributes.description: Hooray! The machine is doing all the hard work. Farming is easy this way!

attributes.title: Jam in Store II
attributes.description: All you need to do now is wait for the Apple Jam to finish, and then sell it for a pile of Coins!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just made some coins selling off Apple Jam from the farm. Join Family Farm Seaside to start making a profit for yourself!!!
attributes.hint: Processed items are more profitable than just selling crops!

attributes.text: Sell 1 jar of Apple Jam from the Barn

attributes.title: Jam in Store II
attributes.description: Cha-Ching! That was lot of coins! I'm rich!

attributes.title: Pure White
attributes.description: All right, you are doing great! Oh - you see that cow? Better put up a fence before she wonders off!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s's farm looks amazing with the new White Fences! Come to decorate your own farm in Family Farm Seaside!
attributes.hint: You can find loads of great decorations in the Store.

attributes.text: Sell 3 bottles of Milk from the Barn

attributes.title: Pure White
attributes.description: Good job! Your farm looks great and your cow stays on it! Share the news with your friends!

attributes.title: Jam in Store III
attributes.description: The store called again. Looks like they really love your Apple Jam. They want to try Grape Jam now, and they want it fast!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just worked some magic on the farm to get the crops growing faster! Play Family Farm Seaside and get in on the secret!
attributes.hint: Need to harvest fast? Use Super Fertilizer!

attributes.text: Use Super Fertilizer to fertilize 5 times

attributes.title: Jam in Store III
attributes.description: Wow! Did you see how fast crops can grow with fertilizer?

attributes.title: Jam in Store IV
attributes.description: By the way, do you want to know a secret about my brother, Little Darryl? I'll tell you once you load up the machine!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is about to discover Darryl's mystery in Family Farm Seaside! Come and find out what it is!
attributes.hint: Flip the machine's switch to the position for Grape Jam.

attributes.text: Add 3 Jars of Honey to Jam Machine

attributes.title: Jam in Store IV
attributes.description: Good job! Quickly go to the next mission to find out the secret about Little Darryl!

attributes.title: Jam in Store V
