attributes.description: All right, here is the secret: Lil' Darryl is afraid of chickens, hehehe! But don't tell him I said that. He would deny it anyway!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s found out Lil Darryl's secret! Play Family Farm Seaside and find out what it is!
attributes.hint: Products from machines (like jam), get you more profit than just plain crops!

attributes.text: Sell 3 jars of Grape Jam from the Barn

attributes.title: Jam in Store V
attributes.description: Well done! Uh... remember, don't tell Darryl I told you his secret. Just share the news about the Grape Jam with your friends, nothing more!

attributes.title: True Farmer
attributes.description: If my farm instincts are correct (and they usually are), more orders will come. Be ready, take out your shovel, farmer!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is getting more space for the farm. Join Family Farm Seaside and see who can get the biggest farm in town!
attributes.hint: Expand by tapping just outside the edge of your farm.

attributes.title: True Farmer
attributes.description: Good work! You can always trust Felicia's instincts (when it's about farming). Share the news with your friends!

attributes.title: The More the Merrier
attributes.description: Family Farm Seaside is where friends become family. More allies, more benefits!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is already working with friends and farm neighbors to finish tasks! Get connected and join your friends in Family Farm Seaside!
attributes.hint: Connect with Facebook and play together with friends!

attributes.text: Fertilize __total times on your neighbors' farms

attributes.title: The More the Merrier
attributes.description: Good job! The more, the merrier! Share the news with your friends!

attributes.title: Another Day Another Plot
attributes.description: As the old saying goes: The more plots, the more crops, the more fun!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is planting more than ever! Play Family Farm Seaside and see if you can plant more!
attributes.hint: Tap the plow tool and place the plots wherever there is room on your farm.

attributes.title: Another Day Another Plot
attributes.description: Well done! You can sell or keep the Cucumbers. Find out later which animal eats them! Share this news with your friends.

attributes.title: Farm Wealth I
attributes.description: Hit level 7 and you'll be a true 'MC': Master of Crops!
attributes.opengraph_des: Don't stop %s now! %s has reched Level 7 in Family Farm Seaside! Play now to have your own farm!
attributes.hint: Get more XP to level up by planting and processing crops. Sell products from Barn to earn money.

attributes.title: Farm Wealth I
attributes.description: Good work! You are not a rookie anymore! Share this great news to your friends!

attributes.title: A Big Friend I
attributes.description: Hey, I want to show you a new animal! I'm not telling what it is, but it eats Cucumbers!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has a Buffalo on their farm and can now enjoy fresh Buffalo Milk! Come and play now!
attributes.hint: Buffalo eat Cucumbers, and produce Buffalo Milk.

attributes.title: A Big Friend I
attributes.description: Well done farmer! Wait before you drink the milk. There is so much more you can do with it!

attributes.title: A Big Friend II
attributes.description: Well, it's big but very friendly. Her milk gives many products a great, fresh taste!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just got a Buffalo on their farm! You wouldn't have guessed but Buffalo are very profitable! Play Family Farm Seaside and check it out!
attributes.hint: Flip the switch on the Cheese Master to produce Buffalo Milk Cheese.

attributes.text: Add __total Buffalo Milk to Cheese Master
Sell __total Buffalo Milk Cheese from the Barn

attributes.title: A Big Friend II
attributes.description: Wow! Did you see those coins being added to your account? That's a good profit you just made, Farmer! Share the news with your friends!

attributes.title: Busy Bees
attributes.description: Hi, I'm Felicia, Darryl's sister. Do you like insects? We can watch the busy bees together! Stand still and maybe they won't sting!
attributes.opengraph_des: Nothing better than some fresh honey! %s already has some ready to be taste tested! Don't miss the chance to try some together in Family Farm Seaside!
attributes.hint: The bees will fly to ripe Clover and pollinate it to make Honey!

attributes.text: Produce and collect 1 jar of Honey

attributes.title: Busy Bees
attributes.description: Sweet! Don't sell your Honey yet, you will need it soon!

attributes.title: New Tree
attributes.description: All right, you are doing great! Oh - you see that cow? Better shield it from the sun!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s's farm looks amazing with the new tree! Promote the diversity of crops for your own farm in Family Farm Seaside!
attributes.hint: You can find loads of great trees in the Store.

attributes.title: New Tree
attributes.description: Good job! Your farm looks great and your cow feels comfortable! Share the news with your friends!

attributes.title: Jam in Store IV
attributes.description: By the way, do you want to know a secret about my brother, Little Darryl? I'll tell you once you load up the machine!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is about to discover Darryl's mystery in Family Farm Seaside! Come and find out what it is!
attributes.hint: Flip the machine's switch to the position for Grape Jam.

attributes.text: Add 1 Jar of Honey to Jam Machine

attributes.title: Jam in Store IV
attributes.description: Good job! Quickly go to the next mission to find out Little Darryl's secret!

attributes.title: Jam in Store V
attributes.description: All right, here is the secret: Lil' Darryl is afraid of chickens, hehehe! But don't tell him I said that. He would deny it anyway!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s found out Lil Darryl's secret! Play Family Farm Seaside and find out what it is!
attributes.hint: Products from machines (like jam), get you more profit than just plain crops!

attributes.text: Sell 3 jars of Grape Jam from the Barn

attributes.title: Jam in Store V
attributes.description: Well done! Remember, no telling Darryl I told you his secret. Just share the news about the Grape Jam with your friends, nothing else!

attributes.title: True Farmer
attributes.description: If my farm instincts are correct (and they usually are), more orders are coming. Be ready, take out your shovel, farmer!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is getting more space for the farm. Join Family Farm Seaside and see who can get the biggest farm in town!
attributes.hint: Expand by tapping just outside the edge of your farm.

attributes.text: Get 3 milk from your Gift Box

attributes.title: True Farmer
attributes.description: Good work! You can always trust Felicia's instincts (when it's about farming). Share the news with your friends!

attributes.title: For the Store I
attributes.description: Oh, yes, I almost forgot. Ol'MacDonald would like to know if you could handle the convenience store's orders.
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is a farming machine! The farm is in full production and orders are being filled! Join Family Farm Seaside and get started!
attributes.hint: They want tomatoes, honey and cheese... Let's start with milk and honey!

attributes.title: For the Store I
attributes.description: Well done! This order is no problem for you. Ready for the next step? Share this with your friends!

attributes.title: For the Store II
attributes.description: The store orders tomatoes from us, because other suppliers gave them apples and said they were tomatoes! Can you believe that?
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just sold some tomatoes and is now considered a fantastic supplier for shops around the farm! Play Family Farm Seaside to sell your own veggies!

attributes.title: For the Store II
attributes.description: Awesome! You are so much smarter than those previous suppliers! Share this if you are ready to continue!

attributes.title: For the Store III
attributes.description: The order is almost complete! Let's get 2 Hay Bales to celebrate the accomplishment of your steadily growing farm!
attributes.opengraph_des: There are no limits to what %s can achieve in Family Farm Seaside! Come and play now too!

attributes.text: Sell 8 Cheddar Cheese from the Barn
Sell 5 Buffalo Milk Cheese from the Barn

attributes.title: For the Store III
attributes.description: You rock! You completed the order for the convenience store very well! Are you ready to continue?

attributes.title: Coffee Bean
attributes.description: Ol'MacDonald loves Mocha Coffee. That's why he likes to order fresh coffee beans from my ranch!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s's harvested Coffee Beans smell great and are ready to be turned into delicious Coffee! Come and check it out now!
attributes.hint: Harvest plenty for Ol'MacDonald. If too much, make some Mocha Coffee in the Coffee Machine yourself!

attributes.title: Coffee Bean
attributes.description: Good work, farmer! Share this with your friends, and see what happens next!

attributes.title: Forever Friends I
attributes.description: Working on your own is hard work, but working with friends makes everything easier! Let's find more neighbors!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s now has some new neighbors in Family Farm Seaside! Join the game to become a farmer too!
attributes.hint: Need more neighbors? Connect with Facebook and play together with your friends!

attributes.title: Forever Friends I
attributes.description: Well done! Your farm is moving on up, and is bustling with life! There's more fun yet to come!

attributes.title: Forever Friends II
attributes.description: Let's say hi to the neighbors! But first, plant plenty of crops. They can grow while you visit neighbors!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s planted Grapes and Cucumbers in Family Farm Seaside, such a healthy lifestyle! Play the game, have your own farm!
attributes.hint: Note the difference in growing times! Use fertilizer on the slow-growing crops.

attributes.title: Forever Friends II
attributes.description: Awesome work, farmer! You're got a good farm rhythm going now. Share this with your friends!

attributes.title: Forever Friends III
attributes.description: Help your neighbors by fertilizing their growing crops. It will give you coins, XP and they'll visit your farm too!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s likes to help neighbors and now has many friends! Play Family Farm Seaside to have your own farm and help out your neighbors!

attributes.text: Fertilize 15 times on your neighbors' farm

attributes.title: Forever Friends III
attributes.description: Great job! You're not only a very helpful neighbor, your farm is also prospering as well! Now are you ready to make some profit?

attributes.title: Forever Friends IV
attributes.description: Now you have made some good friends. If you want money too, process your crops for higher profit!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s produced Grape Jam and Buffalo Milk Cheese, sounds like a feast in the making! Play Family Farm Seaside, many products are awaiting you!
attributes.hint: Buffalo Milk Cheese and Grape Jam are more profitable than Cucumbers and Grapes!

attributes.title: Forever Friends IV
attributes.description: Congratulations! You indeed know the essence of farming! Continue your hard work and your farm will be better and better!

attributes.title: Forever Friends V
attributes.description: Time to go to the market and reap the harvests of your hard work! Guess how much you can earn, 1500 coins?
attributes.opengraph_des: %s made new friends and is now after some profits! Join Family Farm Seaside and earn some cash for selling products!

attributes.text: Sell 12 Buffalo Milk Cheese from the Barn
Sell 12 jars of Grape Jam from the Barn

attributes.title: Forever Friends V
attributes.description: Well done, wealthy farmer! You now really understand how to make more money! You're ready for the future!

attributes.title: Family Picnic I
attributes.description: We're going for our annual family picnic soon! We need enough food and drinks for Grandma Blair, OI'MacDonald, Darryl and me!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is preparing all the necessary ingredients for a great picnic! Join in the fun, play Family Farm Seaside now!
attributes.hint: Don't sell your Oat Flour yet. You'll need it soon!

attributes.title: Family Picnic I
attributes.description: Good work! This will be a tasty and healthy picnic for everyone! Tell your friends!

attributes.title: Family Picnic II
attributes.description: Let's make sure we have everyone's favorite picnic dishes. I know Grandma has a sweet tooth, so let's prepare some honey!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is working hard to make the best picnic ever! You can do it too, play now!
attributes.hint: Give the bees enough time to pollinate your mature Clovers!

attributes.title: Family Picnic II
attributes.description: Awesome work! Grandma Blair will have lots of sweet, sweet honey. Tell the world!

attributes.title: Family Picnic III
attributes.description: Personally, I think Oat Bread is better than all the other types of breads... it's full of so much fibre!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is trying to organize a healthy and fun picnic, and needs your help! Play Family Farm Seaside and organize a picnic too!

attributes.title: Family Picnic III
attributes.description: Good work! However the picnic is not quite ready yet. Let's continue!

attributes.title: Family Picnic IV
attributes.description: Ol'MacDonald is very fond of jams, specifically Cherry Jam but Grandma just broke our last jam jar! Oh no!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s collected Jars from neighbors and produced delicious Cherry Jam! Did you give him some? Check out Family Farm Seaside now!
attributes.hint: Use the Ask button to collect Jam Jars from your neighbors. Don't trade any until you have 3.

attributes.text: Ask for 3 Jam Jars from your Neighbors

attributes.title: Family Picnic IV
attributes.description: Well done! Thanks to you there we have Cherry Jam again. Share the news!

attributes.title: Family Picnic V
attributes.description: I need some pocket money so I guess we'll have to sell some things!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just sold some fresh Bread, Jam and Honey and now has some pocket money to spend. See what you can earn and buy by playing Family Farm Seaside, come and try!

attributes.text: Sell 12 loaves of Oat Bread from the Barn
Sell 6 Cherry Jam from the Barn
Sell 8 jars of Honey from the Barn

attributes.title: Family Picnic V
attributes.description: Good work! Did you see all those coins you made, there now yours!

attributes.title: Family Picnic VI
attributes.description: Can you do me a favor? While I set up the Juice Machine to make some juice, can you feed the Buffalo for me? Thanks!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just looked after their Buffalo by feeding it some Cucumbers and got some Buffalo Milk. Play Family Farm seaside to buy and take care of your own animals!
attributes.hint: Feed Cucumbers to the Buffalo to produce Buffalo Milk.

attributes.title: Family Picnic VI
attributes.description: Well done! You really are a true farmer. Let's see how Darryl is getting on with with the Juice Machine!

attributes.title: Family Picnic VII
attributes.description: Let's make some healthy and delicious fruit juice. Oh and we better find a neighbor to keep an eye on the farm when we are out at the picnic.
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is inviting neighbors to join in the fun, don't miss out, play Family Farm Seaside now!

attributes.title: Family Picnic VII
attributes.description: Good work! The picnic is almost ready. One step to go - and a request from Darryl! Find out what it is!

attributes.title: Family Picnic VIII
attributes.description: Oh - with all this preparation, I forgot to feed the rabbit. Can you take care of this? Thanks!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s nearly forgot to feed their rabbit because of all the excitement for the picnic. Fancy a picnic? You can have one on your own farm by playing Family Farm Seaside.

attributes.text: Feed Carrots to the Rabbit 3 times

attributes.title: Family Picnic VIII
attributes.description: Well done! Thanks to you, no farm work has been neglected! Are you ready to finish the preparations for the picnic?

attributes.title: Family Picnic IX
attributes.description: And last but not least, we can't forget Darryl's favorite: Buffalo Milk Cheese!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s put a lot of effort on the picnic preparations, you can tell by the success it had! Play Family Farm Seaside and organize amazing picnics too!

attributes.text: Sell 10 glasses of Apple Juice from the Barn
Sell 14 bundles of Angora Hair from the Barn
Sell 14 Buffalo Milk Cheese from the Barn

attributes.title: Family Picnic IX
attributes.description: Good work! We are all set for the picnic now! Share the news, enjoy the picnic and move on to the next adventure!

attributes.title: Sweet Sheep I
attributes.description: I would like to show you a new animal. Are you up for that? It says Baaaah!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is trying to do it big by levelling up and buying new animals! Nothing you cannot do, come and play now!
attributes.hint: No, it is a Sheep! But don't worry, you'll have a Goat later. And Sheep make a valuable asset too!

attributes.title: Sweet Sheep I
attributes.description: Good work! Sheep are cute, and will provide you with valuable wool. Want to learn more?

attributes.title: Sweet Sheep II
attributes.description: The Sheep's diet is simple, but very healthy for them. They eat Wheat, nothing else.
attributes.opengraph_des: %s knows how to take care of Sheep by harvesting and feeding them Wheat. Play now and take care of your own cute sheep!
attributes.hint: Feed Wheat to the Sheep and collect her product!

attributes.title: Sweet Sheep II
attributes.description: Great work! It looks like the Sheep will have a happy life. You take good care of her! :-) Share this with your friends!

attributes.title: Sweet Sheep III
attributes.description: Wool is what the Sheep makes. Wool can keep a farmer warm in colder seasons!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s produced some Wool to prepare for the Winter. Make sure you prepare too,play Family Farm Seaside now!

attributes.text: Sell 15 bundles of wool from the Barn

attributes.title: Sweet Sheep III
attributes.description: Good job! Thanks to you and the Sheep, nobody will suffer from the cold! Tell your friends!

attributes.title: More Wine & Dine
attributes.description: My sister Felicia is just receiving a new order from Frank's Family Diner. Can you take care of it?
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has made some extra cash by selling some tasty White Wine. Play Family Farm Seaside and join in with the fun!

attributes.text: Sell 5 glasses of Orange Juice from the Barn
Sell 15 bottles of Wine from the Barn
Sell 15 bottles of White Wine from the Barn

attributes.title: More Wine & Dine
attributes.description: Well done! You made extra profit. Are you ready to invest it back in your farm? Share this with your friends!

attributes.title: Grow your business
attributes.description: Wow, these orders from Frank's Family Diner are very profitable. Let's do some investments!
attributes.opengraph_des: It's important to invest in the future. %s has invested by expanding the land on the farm. How about you? Join Family Farm Seaside and invest in your future too!

attributes.title: Grow your business
attributes.description: Awesome work! Are you ready for more farm adventures?

attributes.title: For the Store III
attributes.description: The order is almost complete! Let's earn more coins to celebrate the accomplishment of your steadily growing farm!
attributes.opengraph_des: There are no limits to what %s can achieve in Family Farm Seaside! Come and play now too!

attributes.text: Sell 5 Buffalo Milk Cheese from the Barn

attributes.title: For the Store III
attributes.description: You rock! You completed the order for the store! Are you ready to continue?

attributes.title: Forever Friends I
attributes.description: Working on your own is hard work, but working with friends makes everything easier! Let's find more neighbors!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has some new neighbors in Family Farm Seaside! Join the game to become a farmer too!
attributes.hint: Need more neighbors? Connect with Facebook and play together with your friends!

attributes.title: Forever Friends I
attributes.description: Well done! Your farm is moving on and bustling with life! There's more fun yet to come!

attributes.text: Sell 7 servings of Almond Omelet from the Barn

attributes.title: Coming Cold I
attributes.description: Brrr. Have you noticed? It is gradually getting colder. Time to prepare for winter!
attributes.opengraph_des: No Winter is too cold for %s after producing bundles of Wool! Make sure you are ready for the cold too, come and play Family Farm Seaside now!
attributes.hint: Get wood for the fireplace, and prepare to make extra food.

attributes.text: Collect 5 Sets of Gloves from neighbors

attributes.title: Coming Cold I
attributes.description: Good work, farmer! But there is lots more to do. Don't leave your farm in the cold!

attributes.title: Coming Cold II
attributes.description: I wish we could also dress warmer. Do you have any ideas on how to arrange that?
attributes.opengraph_des: %s always wants to be prepared and lately has been making some warmer clothes on the farm. Join Family Farm Seaside and prepare together!
attributes.hint: Feed Wheat to the Sheep to Produce Wool. Feed Carrot to the Angara Rabbit to collect Angora Hair.

attributes.title: Coming Cold II
attributes.description: Great work! No farmer will be cold this winter! Share this with your friends and continue this adventure!

attributes.title: Coming Cold III
attributes.description: I really hate cold winters. It makes me miss the sweet smell of fresh Lavenders.
attributes.opengraph_des: Flowers can cheer up anyone's day. Join %s and grow flowers for your friends together!

attributes.title: Coming Cold III
attributes.description: Nice work! Felicia's happy again! Share this news with your friends and continue!

attributes.title: Coming Cold IV
attributes.description: We can use extra bread, in the case we get snowed in.
attributes.opengraph_des: It is always good to have a backup plan. %s has already stocked up on farm products, how about you? Join Family Farm Seaside and always have a plan for fun.

attributes.title: Coming Cold IV
attributes.description: Awesome! Whatever happens, we will have enough to eat!

attributes.title: Coming Cold V
attributes.description: One more thing. Perhaps the most important of all: Coffee Beans! Woe you if you live with an Ol'MacDonald who is out of coffee!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s's Coffee makes farmers warm during Winter! Share a cup of Coffee too, play Family Farm Seaside now!

attributes.title: Coming Cold V
attributes.description: Great work, farmer! Once again, you saved the day! Share this with your friends and find out what happens next!

attributes.title: Coming Cold VI
attributes.description: Actually, we all need enough food in case we can't leave the farm because of the bad cold weather.
attributes.opengraph_des: %s knows how important is having enough food for the Winter. Join Family Farm Seaside and prepare your own Winter food!

attributes.title: Coming Cold VI
attributes.description: Awesome! With all this jam, even the coldest winter becomes a sweet adventures...

attributes.title: Coming Cold VII
attributes.description: Let's get Milk for Cheeses too. Better not only make Buffalo Milk Cheese, Darryl will eat all of that just on his own!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is making space to make some delicious farm products, join Family Farm Seaside, and work to make products together!

attributes.title: Coming Cold VII
attributes.description: Good work! There will be plenty of Cheese soon! Are you ready to make that happen?

attributes.title: Coming Cold VIII
attributes.description: The beauty of it all is: if we don't get snowed in after all, we can always sell all that Cheese later!
attributes.opengraph_des: Who doesn't like cheese? %s already has several different kinds on the farm, join Family Farm Seaside, and make some of your own!

attributes.title: Coming Cold VIII
attributes.description: Awesome! Thanks to you, the whole farm is well prepared for the coming cold. Share the news with your friends!

attributes.title: Honorable Orders I
attributes.description: King Jarvis of Shedovia has placed an order! He wants Champagne to christen his royal yacht. Can you help?
attributes.opengraph_des: The King of Royal Story has personally asked %s to make him some wine. Join Family Farm Seaside, and you may be picked to do the same too!
attributes.hint: Grow Chardonnay, and use the Wine Machine to make Champagne out of it.

attributes.text: Add 3 Chardonnay to the Wine Maker

attributes.title: Honorable Orders I
attributes.description: Well done! Your Chardonnay will make excellent ship christening champagne!

attributes.title: Honorable Orders II
attributes.description: Personally, I think it's a pity to throw Champagne at a boat. After all the boat can't even taste it!
attributes.opengraph_des: The King of Royal Story is still asking %s to fill some orders. Play Family Farm Seaside and see if your products are good enough for royal use too!
attributes.hint: Put Chardonnay in the Wine Maker to make Champagne.

attributes.text: Sell 16 bottles of Champagne from the Barn

attributes.title: Honorable Orders II
attributes.description: Awesome work! Thanks to you, King Jarvis will be done no harm when he sails out. Tell all your friends!

attributes.title: Honorable Orders III
attributes.description: King Jarvis also wants something to drink when he celebrates his new ships. He prefers White Wine for this.
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is making a feast for a king... Can you do better with your farm? Join Family Farm Seaside and see!

attributes.text: Sell 18 bottles of White Wine from the Barn
Sell 16 Buffalo Milk Cheese from the Barn

attributes.title: Honorable Orders III
attributes.description: Well done! Will King Jarvis of Shedovia order more products from us?

attributes.title: Honorable Orders IV
attributes.description: King Jarvis is amazed by the freshness of our farm products. He is placing a bigger order for Bread and Cheese!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has received Royal Story's King Jarvis, and made enough farm products for everyone. Play Family Farm Seaside and join in the celebration!

attributes.text: Sell 20 Cheddar Cheese from the Barn
Sell 12 loaves of Oat Bread from the Barn

attributes.title: Honorable Orders IV
attributes.description: Great work! Tell all your friends about your order for King Jarvis of Shedovia!

attributes.title: Hickery Dickery Duck I
attributes.description: Time for yet a new animal on the farm! It quacks and lives on the water. What is it?
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just added a Duck Pond to its farm! Cute animals are awaiting you, join Family Farm Seaside now!
attributes.hint: First buy 4 Water Ponds and place them 2X2 on the farm. Then place a Duck Pond on top of it.

attributes.text: Buy 4 Water Pond and place them 2X2
Place a Green Duck Pond on the Water
Place an extra Green Duck in the Duck Pond

attributes.title: Hickery Dickery Duck I
attributes.description: Hooray! You now have ducks on your farm! Spread the news!

attributes.title: Hickery Dickery Duck II
attributes.description: The appropriate meal for these lovely ducks is Oats. They really like that best.
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is taking good care of the Ducks by producing their favourite food, Oat! Become an amazing farmer, play Family Farm Seaside!

attributes.title: Hickery Dickery Duck II
attributes.description: Good work! You now have Oat to feed to the Ducks. Tell everyone the good news!

attributes.title: Hickery Dickery Duck III
attributes.description: If you feed them well, the ducks will lay eggs. Duck Eggs, of course, are known for their outspoken taste and nutritious value!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just discovered how to make fresh mayo from scratch. Play Family Farm Seaside and discover what other tasty products you can get from the farm!
attributes.hint: Use Duck Eggs later to make Mayonnaise, for example.

attributes.title: Hickery Dickery Duck III
attributes.description: Well done! Share the news with your friends and get ready for the next mission!

attributes.title: Cherry Good Question
attributes.description: They say there is only 1 thing juicier than cherries, and that is Gisela Cherries! Ready to see if this is true?
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just made life sweeter by harvesting Cherries! Put a Cherry on your life too, play Family Farm Seaside!

attributes.title: Cherry Good Question
attributes.description: Great! So, which tastes better: the normal cherry or the Gisela Cherry?

attributes.title: Coming Cold IV
attributes.description: We can use extra bread, in the case we get snowed in.
attributes.opengraph_des: What is a good side almost every time? That's right, bread! Join %s in Family Farm Seaside and make some together!

attributes.title: Coming Cold IV
attributes.description: Awesome! Whatever happens, we will have enough to eat!

attributes.title: Obi's Orders I
attributes.description: Cook Master Obi San Kenobi from the Japanese restaurant placed an order! He needs Rice and Cucumber for his famous sushi salad!
attributes.opengraph_des: A master Japanese chef has visited %s's farm. Play Family Farm Seaside to get your own farm, and see who will come and visit you!

attributes.title: Obi's Orders I
attributes.description: Well done! The Cook Master now has a great stock of salad ingredients again!

attributes.title: Obi's Orders II
attributes.description: Cook Master Obi wants to top his sushi salads with our famous mayonnaise. Can we make that?
attributes.opengraph_des: What can be more healthy than a salad? How about salad with sushi? Join %s and play Family Farm Seaside!

attributes.text: Add 3 Duck Eggs in the Sauce Machine

attributes.title: Obi's Orders II
attributes.description: Good work! The Cook Master's famous salad will have the most delicious topping! All thanks to you!

attributes.title: Obi's Orders III
attributes.description: Cook Master Obi is not done yet. He needs top quality Milk, Rye, and Eggs too!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has collected only the best ingredients for master chef Obi. Are you products up to par? Play Family Farm Seaside and find out!

attributes.title: Obi's Orders III
attributes.description: Eggsellent! The Cook Master will be totally Zen again! Silently share the news!

attributes.title: Chez Charelle I
attributes.description: There is also an order from the classy boutique Chez Charelle. They need feathers, wool and angora hair for their products!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just bought and fed a Peacock, the farm is so lively with all these lovely animals! Have your own farm in Family Farm Seaside!

attributes.text: Place a Peacock on the farm
Feed Rice to the Peacock 3 times

attributes.title: Chez Charelle I
attributes.description: Well done! The boutique will be so happy! Share the success with your friends!

attributes.title: Chez Charelle II
attributes.description: The boutique said they use the rabbit hair to replace real fur. Customers nowadays don't want fur anymore, or so they say!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is making farm products that are in demand. How about you? Play Family Farm Seaside, and see what the market needs!

attributes.text: Sell 22 Peacock Feathers from the Barn
Sell 20 bundles of Wool from the Barn
Sell 20 bundles of Angora Hair from the Barn

attributes.title: Chez Charelle II
attributes.description: Good work, farmer! Share the news with your friends and find out what happens next!

attributes.title: Think Big IV
attributes.description: Time to level up and save up some cash!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is leveling up and saving cash for the next epic farm adventure! Play Family Farm Seaside and join in on the excitement!

attributes.title: Think Big IV
attributes.description: Well done, farmer! Another level, another buck! Share the success with your fellow farmers!

attributes.title: Friendly Birds I
attributes.description: Now that we have money, it's time to invest. How about an aviaries park? Good for business, as well as preserving endangered species!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is taking measures to increase farm business. How are your farm's prospects? Play Family Farm Seaside, and see whose farm attracts more business!

attributes.title: Friendly Birds I
attributes.description: Hooray! The park is built! Continue to see what else you need!

attributes.title: Friendly Birds II
attributes.description: Let's dress our personnel properly. They must look handsome and be easy to recognize.
attributes.opengraph_des: %s invested money on an Aviaries Park to become richer! Don't be left out, have your own farm and become rich in Family Farm Seaside!

attributes.title: Friendly Birds II
attributes.description: Awesome! This Aviaries Park is going to be great! Share the news!

attributes.title: Friendly Birds III
attributes.description: Visitors will need some things. First, a guide so they don't get lost in the park. And second, drinks!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s received the help of neighbors to collect Park Guides and sold some Grape Juice for a good profit! Come and check it out now!

attributes.text: Sell 25 cups of Grape Juice from the Barn

attributes.title: Friendly Birds III
attributes.description: Good work! But will the visitors need something to eat too?

attributes.title: Friendly Birds IV
attributes.description: We also must provide something for our hungry visitors. Or for those who just can't stay away from burgers.
attributes.opengraph_des: By producing Cheese Burgers and Ketchup, %s is making sure those who visit the Aviaries Park won't be hungry! Do it too, play Family Farm Seaside!

attributes.text: Sell 25 Cheese Burgers to the visitors

attributes.title: Friendly Birds IV
attributes.description: Well done! Visitors now have excessively easy access to delicious burgers!

attributes.title: Friendly Birds V
attributes.description: Almost ready to open! We just need a friendly goodbye gift so the visitors will have a day that they will never forget!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is making party preparations. Are you invited? Play Family Farm Seaside and see if you can get on the guest list!

attributes.title: Friendly Birds V
attributes.description: Great! Your visitors will never forget you, thanks to the Mementoes and the fact that you can now share this news!

attributes.title: Friendly Birds VI
attributes.description: Hooray! Now we're ready to open! Let's celebrate this with drinks for all first day visitors!
attributes.opengraph_des: The visitors are coming, and you are invited too! Play Family Farm Seaside, and visit %s's ranch today!
attributes.hint: Harvest the Aviaries Park in time to collect the profit.

attributes.text: Sell 30 bottles of Champagne from the Barn
Sell 30 bottles of White Wine from the Barn

attributes.title: Friendly Birds VI
attributes.description: Great work! Your Aviaries Park is a success and will forever be a source of income for your farm!

attributes.title: Oh My Ostrich I
attributes.description: I suddenly have the feeling we will need Daisies soon. I don't know why... But better grow some, just in case my gut is right.
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is collecting a lot daisies on the farm these days. Wonder what could be going on? Play Family Farm Seaside, and see what the surprise will be!

attributes.title: Oh My Ostrich I
attributes.description: Well done! Continue to see if you really need the daisies soon!

attributes.title: Oh My Ostrich II
attributes.description: Look what I found down the road! The poor thing was shivering in the cold, so I decided to adopt it. Isn't he lovely?
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is now providing food and shelter to an Ostrich, another amazing animal joined the farm! Don't miss out, play Family Farm Seaside now!

attributes.text: Place a Black Ostrich on the Ranch
Feed 3 Daisy to the Black Ostrich

attributes.title: Oh My Ostrich II
attributes.description: Awesome! Good thing the ostrich eats daisies! Share the news with your friends!

attributes.title: Oh My Ostrich III
attributes.description: Hmm, that ostrich looks pretty nice. Especially next to the peacock. I wonder whose feathers have higher value!
attributes.opengraph_des: Play Family Farm Seaside now, and see what unique birds %s has collected on the farm recently!

attributes.text: Sell 35 Ostrich Feathers from the Barn
Sell 35 Peacock Feathers from the Barn

attributes.title: Oh My Ostrich III
attributes.description: Well done! Did you see how Peacock Feathers give you more profit? Let's share the news!

attributes.title: Tiramisu for Tanya I
attributes.description: More orders are coming in, but they can wait. First I must do my friend Tanya a favor. She runs a bakery and needs Tiramisu!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has a Chocolate Tree!!! Don't be jealous, you can have one too, play Family Farm Seaside now!

attributes.title: Tiramisu for Tanya I
attributes.description: Excellent! You will not regret your Chocolate Tree!

attributes.title: Tiramisu for Tanya II
attributes.description: Let me start the Cake Machine while you check for the necessary ingredients. Okay?
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is up to something on the farm. Seems like chocolate will be the ingredient for the next farm product. Play Family Farm Seaside and check it out!
attributes.hint: Chocolate will give you sweet satisfaction many times later!

attributes.text: Add 3 Chocolate to the Cake Machine
Add 3 Sacks of Wheat Flour to the Cake Machine
Add 3 Eggs to the Cake Machine

attributes.title: Tiramisu for Tanya II
attributes.description: Awesome! Look at that machine go! Invite all your friends to come over and eat Tiramisu soon!

attributes.title: Tiramisu for Tanya III
attributes.description: All right, we're ready to make the Tiramisu! Let's throw in some fresh Orange Juice too, what do you say?
attributes.opengraph_des: %s knows how to lead a happy life by producing delicious Tiramisu! Have a piece, play Family Farm Seaside now!

attributes.text: Sell 3 Tiramisu Cakes from the Barn
Sell 8 cups of Orange Juice from the Barn

attributes.title: Tiramisu for Tanya III
attributes.description: Great work! Tanya will totally be tempted by your terriffic tiramisu! Share the news!

attributes.title: Jamie's Jam Joint I
attributes.description: Still have energy for another order? Jamie's Jam Joint wants our jam!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is working hard on the farm to start making some jam. Lend a helping hand, and start playing Family Farm Seaside now!

attributes.title: Jamie's Jam Joint I
attributes.description: Berry good, farmer! Share the news with your friends now!

attributes.title: Jamie's Jam Joint II
attributes.description: By the way, which do you prefer? Blueberry or Pitaya Jam?
attributes.opengraph_des: Come check out all the awesome flavors of jam %s has been able to come up with. Play Family Farm Seaside now!

attributes.text: Sell 40 jars of Blueberry Jam from the Barn
Sell 30 jars of Pitaya Jam from the Barn

attributes.title: Jamie's Jam Joint II
attributes.description: Great work! Blueberry or Pitaya Jam, both are delicious and profitable! Share the news!

attributes.title: A Richer Ranch
attributes.description: Time to expand business! Enlarge your farm now!
attributes.opengraph_des: Think outside the box, there are no limits. %s has the spirit and has expanded the farm to new levels. Check it out in Family Farm Seaside!
attributes.hint: A larger farm is good for business!

attributes.title: A Richer Ranch
attributes.description: Great job! You can now grow more crops, use more machines, raise more animals, and so on! Share the news!

attributes.title: Harry the Hermit I
attributes.description: What a strange order we have here. It's from Harry the Hermit. He wants bread and Angora Hair. Strange combination!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has been visiting a lot of neighboring farms lately to lend a helping hand. Join Family Farm Seaside and also help your friends' farms!

attributes.title: Harry the Hermit I
attributes.description: Good work! You are using your new land well, and forged closer ties with your friends in the process! Share the news to thank everyone!

attributes.title: Harry the Hermit II
attributes.description: Well, the customer is king. That's the saying. So let's get started, what do you say?
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has been filling orders and making the customers happy! Play Family Farm Seaside and see if your products will meet the customers' demands too!

attributes.text: Sell 45 loaves of Black Bread from the Barn
Sell 20 bundles of Angora Hair from the Barn

attributes.title: Harry the Hermit II
attributes.description: Well done! Harry the Hermit now has bread to eat, and hair to keep him warm! You think this is strange? Just wait until you see the next order!

attributes.title: Nut a Joke I
attributes.description: There is an order from someone called Nutty Nadine. She seems to want Almond Cakes. But we don't have a way to crack the nuts first!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just received help from neighboring farms. Play Family Farm Seaside and work together with neighbors to reach the next goal!

attributes.title: Nut a Joke I
attributes.description: Great work! Now you have the nuts, and a way to crack them. Or is someone cracking a joke instead? Play on and find out!

attributes.title: Nut a Joke II
attributes.description: Hmm. Nutty Nadine ordering nut cakes. Either I am in a weird dream, or this a bad joke. Let's make something else too!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just sold Almond Cakes and Orange Jam! Doesn't it make you hungry? Play now to bake your own cakes and produce your own jam!

attributes.text: Sell 8 Almond Cakes from the Barn
Sell 12 jars of Orange Jam from the Barn

attributes.title: Nut a Joke II
attributes.description: Good work! Nutty Nadine likes the jam and promises to order more later. Well done!

attributes.title: Darryl on a Roll I
attributes.description: Hooray! Grandma Blair let me invite all my friends for a party. Right here on the farm! There's lots of work to do. Let's begin!
attributes.opengraph_des: What is better than a fresh and healthy salad straight from the farm? Join %s and enjoy fresh products in Family Farm Seaside!

attributes.title: Darryl on a Roll I
attributes.description: Well done! This will be the happiest party Darryl has ever seen! Share the news!

attributes.title: Darryl on a Roll II
attributes.description: I have a great idea! We can put up tents and spend the night in the field! What do you think?
attributes.opengraph_des: %s collected Tents and will sleep with friends under the stars! Doesn't it sound marvellous? Join in the fun, play Family Farm Seaside!

attributes.title: Darryl on a Roll II
attributes.description: Great work! Thanks to you, no one has to sleep without shelter or go home! Share the news with your friends!

attributes.title: Darryl on a Roll III
attributes.description: Food! We need lots of food! My friends especially like salami!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s fed the Cattle and produced some Salami! More amazing products can be made in Family Farm Seaside, come and check it out now!

attributes.text: Harvest 60 Pasture to feed the Cattle

attributes.title: Darryl on a Roll III
attributes.description: Awesome! The kids will be so happy with the salami! Share the news!

attributes.title: Darryl on a Roll IV
attributes.description: I am so grateful Grandma Blair is letting me have my friends come over! I will catch some beautiful butterflies for her!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is collecting items from neighboring farms. Play Family Farm Seaside and see what your neighbors will send you!

attributes.title: Darryl on a Roll IV
attributes.description: Well done! Grandma will be delighted when she sees your butterflies!

attributes.title: Darryl on a Roll V
attributes.description: Oh, and we can stay up late and have a campfire! We'll even have some Corn to roast above it!
attributes.opengraph_des: Nothing like a meal and stories around the campfire! Join %s and see what other great activities you can prepare in Family Farm Seaside!

attributes.text: Harvest 60 Corn for the camp fire

attributes.title: Darryl on a Roll V
attributes.description: Great job! Now the kids can find out at the campfire who is the greatest story teller among them!

attributes.title: Darryl on a Roll VI
attributes.description: When the sun is out and shining, it will be warm and we will go for a swim! But we need swim rings for those who can't!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s collected swim rings for those who can't swim and baked Tiramisu for the hungry ones! Sounds like they're having fun, play Family Farm Seaside too!
attributes.hint: Use Chocolates,Wheat Flour and Eggs to produce Tiramisu Cakes in the Cake Machine.

attributes.title: Darryl on a Roll VI
attributes.description: Well done! Nothing like a good swim and sweet Tiramisu! They'll love it! Share this and find out what's next!

attributes.title: All About Acting I
attributes.description: A new order! This time it's from the local School of Drama. They need decorations for their backgrounds and outfits!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is helping out the farming community by filling some new orders. Join Family Farm Seaside and start some of your own orders today!
attributes.hint: First, place 9 Pond Water 3 X 3. Then, place the Goose Pond over it.

attributes.text: Buy 9 Pond Water and place them 3 x 3
Place a Goose Pond on the Water

attributes.title: All About Acting I
attributes.description: Great work! Look, the Goose is already smiling at you! Or would that be because he knows you'll feed him soon?

attributes.title: All About Acting II
attributes.description: The drama school wants feathers. Lots of them! Let's start with the Geese. They eat Lotus!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just harvested lotus flowers needed for a drama performance in Family Farm Seaside. Play now and see what else there is to do on the farm!

attributes.text: Feed 3 Lotus Flowers to the Goose

attributes.title: All About Acting II
attributes.description: Well done! But how many Goose Feathers will you need? Continue and find out!

attributes.title: All About Acting III
attributes.description: Did you produce a Goose Feather too many, by chance? Don't worry, feathers look great on hats too, which we will make later!
attributes.opengraph_des: Goose feathers sure do make nice hats. %s just sold a bunch of goose feathers from the farm. Play Family Farm and start producing your own products!

attributes.text: Sell 65 Goose Feathers from the Barn

attributes.title: All About Acting III
attributes.description: Great job! The Goose Feathers are done. But what about the other kinds of feathers? Share the news and then find out!

attributes.title: All About Acting IV
attributes.description: It's amazing what drama folks do with feathers. Their last year's show Pangpang Peacock Style had a Peacock Feather skirt!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is producing some peacock feathers. Play Family Farm Seaside and see what kind of colorful creations you can come up with together!
attributes.hint: Peacocks eat Rice.

attributes.text: Sell 65 Peacock Feathers from the Barn

attributes.title: All About Acting IV
attributes.description: Well done! Your Peacock Feathers are the most beautiful on earth! Share this news!

attributes.title: All About Acting V
attributes.description: All right, let's complete the Drama School's order and cash in the profit!
attributes.opengraph_des: Ostrich feathers, peacock feathers, goose feathers... What will %s make next? Play Family Farm Seaside and see for yourself!
attributes.hint: Ostriches eat Daisies.

attributes.text: Sell 70 Ostrich Feathers from the Barn

attributes.title: All About Acting V
attributes.description: Good job! Share this with your friends, and find out what happens next!

attributes.title: Baking Contest I
attributes.description: The yearly Baking Contest is back in town. I want to help Felicia prepare so she can win 1st price like I did all the last 3 years!
attributes.opengraph_des: opengraph

attributes.title: Baking Contest I
attributes.description: My secret is a lot of fruit! It's a healthy and sweet combination nobody can withstand

attributes.title: Baking Contest II
attributes.description: You can use fruits in many different kinds of forms including jam which tastes great in cakes. Let's help Felicia by making some Blackberry Jam!
attributes.opengraph_des: opengraph

attributes.text: Sell 70 jars of Blackberry Jam from the Barn

attributes.title: Baking Contest II
attributes.description: Felicia loves the taste of blackberries! However, she also wants to try other some other fruits to get the best taste

attributes.title: Baking Contest III
attributes.description: Felicia's favourite fruit is Banana and therefore she wants to try some Banana cake! Let's help her try!
attributes.opengraph_des: opengraph

attributes.title: Baking Contest III
attributes.description: Nice result! I am sure she can present this to the judges and they will be very impressed

attributes.title: Baking Contest IV
attributes.description: Felicia should definitely learn my speciality: Black Forest Cake! Let's get some people together and have a taste test
attributes.opengraph_des: opengraph

attributes.title: Baking Contest IV
attributes.description: Delicious! I'm so proud of Felicia. She will be even more successful than I was!

attributes.title: Baking Contest V
attributes.description: Darryl always loved Chocolate. To get his vote during the contest, Felicia should prepare something different!
attributes.opengraph_des: opengraph

attributes.title: Baking Contest V
attributes.description: Darryl looks really happy. I think Felicia definitely won his vote

attributes.title: Baking Contest VI
attributes.description: I normally also surprise the judges with something which is not a cake! Let's collect some extra ingredients for this!
attributes.opengraph_des: opengraph

attributes.title: Baking Contest VI
attributes.description: Felicia chose these extras. I'm already curious for what she has in mind!

attributes.title: Baking Contest VII
attributes.description: Oh Rice Krispies! Felicias Specialty. This way she will win for sure!
attributes.opengraph_des: opengraph

attributes.title: Baking Contest VII
attributes.description: Now we are ready to go. Felicia now knows all the tricks to win this contest, fingers crossed!

attributes.title: Baking Contest VIII
attributes.description: Well, I'll show Felicia that I can still pull it off. Let's treat her after all the hard work with some of my special crisps!
attributes.opengraph_des: opengraph

attributes.title: Baking Contest VIII
attributes.description: I'm so excited for tomorrow now. But until then - let's enjoy these sweets!

attributes.title: Water Fun I
attributes.description: The weather is so nice lately, so Grandma Blair wants to have us all go to the beach. Felicia is really happy as she loves sun bathing. But I don't like that, What can I do over there?
attributes.opengraph_des: opengraph

attributes.text: Purchase a Surf Board from Store

attributes.title: Water Fun I
attributes.description: Yes, surfing and swimming would be great! What a good idea! When are we going?

attributes.title: Water Fun II
attributes.description: You can't have a day on the beach without a good lunch. What shall we eat? I know! A huge Steak Burger is the way to go!
attributes.opengraph_des: opengraph

attributes.title: Water Fun II
attributes.description: Yum, that will fill me up! With this I can definitely swim to the other side of the world!

attributes.title: Water Fun III
attributes.description: It will be hot over there. I should prepare some drinks, otherwise I will get dehydrated. Let's see, I think Grandma Blair would love to have some Champagne
attributes.opengraph_des: opengraph

attributes.title: Water Fun III
attributes.description: With all the Champagne we might see a tipsy Grandma Blair. That's always fun to see!

attributes.title: Water Fun IV
attributes.description: I can't forget to prepare some drinks for me and Felicia! I know, I will make some Orange Smoothies! Felicia will love that. Let's prepare them!
attributes.opengraph_des: opengraph

attributes.title: Water Fun IV
attributes.description: The preparations are done! Now we can make the smoothies!

attributes.title: Water Fun V
attributes.description: Alright, so I need to have Condensed Milk and Orange Jam. Oh, I am always so clumsy in the kitchen!
attributes.opengraph_des: opengraph

attributes.title: Water Fun V
attributes.description: Okay, let's load up the car and head to the beach!

attributes.title: Water Fun VI
attributes.description: Everyone is going to the beach, so of course Grandma Blair wants to go to the Marine Park instead. But I don't have any money to pay for the ticket, and it is way too sunny, I can't see a thing with all this sunlight!
attributes.opengraph_des: opengraph

attributes.text: Sell 60 Steak Burger to buy Marine park tickets

attributes.title: Water Fun VI
attributes.description: Yey, I have the tickets and sunglasses and I have enough money left to buy French fries at Marine Park!
